23b2('bum): pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
23b3('bum): myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos shes bya'o/ /
23b4('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dus ma byas kyi chos shes bya ba ni/ gang la skye ba myed cing 'jig pa myed pa dang / gnas
23b5('bum): pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myed pa ste/ 'dod chags zad pa/ zhe sdang zad pa/ gti mug zad pa/ de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid/ chos nyid/ chos kyi dbyings/ chos
23b6('bum): skyon myed pa nyid/ bsam gyis myi khyabs pa'i dbyings/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos shes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thun mong gi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan
23b7('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor thun mong gi chos shes bya ba ni/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/
23b8('bum): de dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang / thun mong gi chos shes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thun mong ma lags pa'i chos shes bya ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
24a1('bum): thun mong ma yin pa'i chos shes bya ba ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
24a2('bum): dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
24a3('bum): myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
24a4('bum): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos shes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi
24a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la rtog pa myed pas chags par myi bya'o/ /chos thams cad gnyis su myed pa'i tshul gyis rtog pa myed cing / rnam par rtog pa myed pa'i
24a6('bum): phyir chos thams cad khong du chud par bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba ci'i slad
24a7('bum): du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul byed par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
24a8('bum): dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa de lta bu'i phul/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgyid par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems can gyi phung po chen po nges
24b1('bum): pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba ni/ rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang
24b2('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nas/ phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
24b3('bum): bar dag ste/ rab 'byor de ni sems can gyi phung po nges pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de lta bu'i phul du byed par 'gyur ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
24b4('bum): rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed de/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje lta bu'i sems skyed pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
24b5('bum): rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ 'khor ba dpag tu myed par sems can thams cad kyi don du bdag gis go cha bgo bar bya'o/ /bdag gis bdog pa thams cad
24b6('bum): yongs su gtang bar bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/ /de ltar
24b7('bum): sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang / sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las bzlas pa myed pas/ chos thams cad skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa bdag gis shes par bya'o/ /
24b8('bum): bdag gis ma 'dres pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gis chos rtogs pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa la bslab par bya'o/ /
25a1('bum): bdag gis chos kyi tshul gcig tu bsgrub pa khong du chud par bya'o/ /bdag gis chos dpag tu med pa thams cad yongs su bsgrub par bslab par bya'o/ /snyam du sems bskyed de/ rab 'byor de ni byang
25a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
25a3('bum): byed do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ sems can dmyal ba pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can ji snyed cig /
25a4('bum): sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de dag thams cad sems can de dag gi don du bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o/ /snyam du sems bskyed de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
25a5('bum): dpa' chen pos/ gong du sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis sems can re re'i don du yang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por/ sems can gang yang phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings
25a6('bum): su/ yongs su mya ngan las ma bzlas kyi bar du/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag kyang / bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o/ /zhes thabs de lta bus sems can thams cad kyi don du/ sems
25a7('bum): can thams cad phung po ma lus pa'i/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma bzlas kyi bar du/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad kyang
25a8('bum): nyams su myong bar bya'o/ /de nas gzod bdag gis don tu dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas/ byang chub kyi tshogs mang po stsogs te/ bla na med pa yang dag
25b1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/ /snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas shing
25b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad
25b3('bum): par brlabs po che'i sems gang gis/ sems can thams cad kyi phul du 'gyur ba/ de lta bu'i sems brlabs po che bskyed par bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems brlabs po che
25b4('bum): ni/ sems dang po bskyed phyin chad 'dod chags kyi sems mi skyed/ zhe sdang gi sems mi skyed/ gti mug gi sems mi skyed/ gtse ba'i sems mi skyed/ nyan thos kyi sems mi bskyed/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems
25b5('bum): myi skyed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems brlabs po che'o/ /des sems can thams cad kyi phul byed kyang / sems brlabs po che des rloms sems su mi bya'o/ /rab 'byor
25b6('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ mi sgul ba'i sems dang ldan par byas te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems myi sgul ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
25b7('bum): pa nyid dang ldan par yid la byed cing / des rloms sems su mi byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi sgul ba'o/ /des sems can thams cad kyi phul du myi dmyigs
25b8('bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o/ /
26a1('bum): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems ni sems can thams cad skyob cing / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong la/ des rloms sems su
26a2('bum): 'gyur ba myed pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems te/ de la gnas shing sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /
26a3('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' pos/ rtag tu rgyun myi chad par chos 'dod par bya'o/ /chos la dga' bar bya'o/ /chos la mos par bya'o/ /chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor
26a4('bum): la brtson par bya'o/ /de la chos gang zhe na/ chos thams cad dbyer med pa ste/ 'di ni chos shes bya'o/ /de la chos 'dod pa gang zhe na/ gang chos de la 'dod cing mos pa ste/ 'di ni chos 'dod pa zhes bya'o/ /de la
26a5('bum): chos la dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang chos de la dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba ste/ 'di ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la mos pa gang zhe na/ gang chos de la yon tan du blta ba ste/ 'di ni chos la
26a6('bum): mos pa zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/ chos de nyid la bsgom zhing mang du byed pa ste/ 'di ni chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor de
26a7('bum): ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
26a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/
26b1('bum): chen po stong pa nyid la gnas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa
26b2('bum): stong pa nyid la gnas/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po
26b3('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du 'gyur bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
26b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la gnas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas/ dbang po rnams la
26b5('bum): gnas/ stobs rnams la gnas/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas/ 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad pa la gnas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas/ bsam gtan rnams la gnas/ tshad myed pa rnams
26b6('bum): la gnas/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas/ rnam par thar pa rnams la gnas/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
26b7('bum): pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la gnas/ mi 'jigs pa rnams la gnas/
26b8('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gnas/ byams pa chen po la gnas/ snying rje chen po la gnas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmyigs
27a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rin chen
27a2('bum): phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ seng ge rnam par brtse ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zla ba bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad las shin
27a3('bum): tu 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos kyi dbyings su nges pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nges pa'i
27a4('bum): rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'od
27a5('bum): gzer rab tu 'gyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dpung rnam par dgod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ tshig bla dgas
27a6('bum): la yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ phyogs su rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nyam pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad yang dag
27a7('bum): par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin la
27a8('bum): gnas/ dbang po dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rgyun gyi rjes su song ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ smrel gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nyon mongs pa
27b1('bum): spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ tshol ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gnas la rten pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sems myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/
27b2('bum): dri ma myed pa'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'od mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dag pa dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/
27b3('bum): 'od dri ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dga' ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ glog gi sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zad myi shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ myi 'pham pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/
27b4('bum): gzi brjid yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zad pa dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ myi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'jig pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nyi ma'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/
27b5('bum): zla ba dri ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ shes rab sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ snang ba gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ snang ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ bya ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ye shes
27b6('bum): dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sems gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rin chen
27b7('bum): mtha'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos dam pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dga' ba spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos kyi 'phags pa'i ting nge
27b8('bum): 'dzin la gnas/ rnam par 'thor ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yi ge mnyam par 'god pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin
28a1('bum): la gnas/ dmyigs pa gcod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'gyur ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ mying nges par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/
28a2('bum): gnas myed par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rab rib myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ spyod pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ g.yo ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yul las rgal ba'i ting nge
28a3('bum): 'dzin la gnas/ yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sems myed par gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing bstsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/
28a4('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ spobs pa mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad las 'da' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/
28a5('bum): yongs su gcod pa byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nem nur rnam par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gnas su bya ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gcig tu rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/
28a6('bum): rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa 'dor ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa'i ting nge 'dzin
28a7('bum): la gnas/ brda' dang sgra la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sgron ma 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba'i ting nge
28a8('bum): 'dzin la gnas/ mngon par dmyigs pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba myed pa'i ting nge
28b1('bum): 'dzin la gnas/ zad myi shes pa'i za ma tog gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gzungs kyi blo gros kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'gal
28b2('bum): ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'thun pa dang 'gal ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'od dri ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ snying po dang ldan pa'i
28b3('bum): ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zla ba dri ma myed par rgyas pa'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ glog gi 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rgyan chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin
28b4('bum): la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rdul myed cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nyon mongs pa myed par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nyon mongs
28b5('bum): pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa myed par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gnas dmyigs su myed pa la brtson pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems myed
28b6('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nam mkha' ltar
28b7('bum): chags pa myed pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor chos de dag la gnas
28b8('bum): shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul byed pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// //
29a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po gsum pa/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das don gang gi
29a2('bum): slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ zhes bgyi ba 'di la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
29a3('bum): dpa' chen po zhes bya ba de la spobs pa skyed cig / sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag tu lta ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du/ sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / sems can du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /
29a4('bum): srog tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / gso bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / skyes bur lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / shed can tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / shed bdag tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /
29a5('bum): byed pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / byed du 'jug pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / slong ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / yongs su slong ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / tshor ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / tshor du
29a6('bum): 'jug pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / shes pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / mthong ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / chad par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rtag par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / yod par lta ba rab tu
29a7('bum): spang ba dang / myed par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / phung por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / khams su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / skye mched du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar lta ba rab tu spang
29a8('bum): ba dang / bden par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / pha rol tu phyin par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / yang dag par spong bar lta ba
29b1('bum): rab tu spang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / dbang por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / stobs su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / 'phags pa'i
29b2('bum): lam yan lag brgyad par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / bsam gtan tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / tshad med par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
29b3('bum): 'jug par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rnam par thar par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
29b4('bum): myed pa dang / smon pa med par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / mngon par shes par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / gzungs kyi sgor lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
29b5('bum): stobs su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / myi 'jigs par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / so so yang dag par rig par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / byams pa chen por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / snying rje chen por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /
29b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / sems can yongs su smyin par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /
29b7('bum): sangs rgyas su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / chos su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / dge 'dun du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du /
29b8('bum): sems can rnams la chos ston par bgyid kyang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bgyid de/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
30a1('bum): la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'du shes su
30a2('bum): lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'du byed du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ myig du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ snar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/
30a3('bum): lcer lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lus su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sgrar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ drir lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ ror lta bar 'gyur ba
30a4('bum): yin/ reg tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chos su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ myig gi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i rnam shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sna'i rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/
30a5('bum): lce'i rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mig gi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i 'dus
30a6('bum): te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg par lta bar
30a7('bum): 'gyur ba yin/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/
30a8('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sa'i khams
30b1('bum): su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chu'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mye'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rlung gi khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ nam mkha'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par
30b2('bum): shes pa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ ma rig par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'du byed du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mying dang gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ skye mched
30b3('bum): drug tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sred par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ len par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ srid par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ skye bar lta bar 'gyur
30b4('bum): ba yin/ rga shir lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ brtson 'grus kyi
30b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ nang stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ phyi stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba
30b6('bum): yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chen po stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'dus byas
30b7('bum): stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du lta
30b8('bum): bar 'gyur ba yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/
31a1('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur
31a2('bum): ba yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yang dag par spong bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/
31a3('bum): dbang por lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ stobs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'phags pa'i bden par
31a4('bum): lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ bsam gtan du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshad myed par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par thar bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/
31a5('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mngon par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/
31a6('bum): ting nge 'dzin du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ gzungs kyi sgor lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mi 'jigs par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ so so yang dag par rig par lta bar 'gyur
31a7('bum): ba yin/ byams pa chen por lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ snying rje chen por lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sems can yongs su smyin par bya bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ /
31a8('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ byang chub tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chos su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ dge 'dun du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/
31b1('bum): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol
31b2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod cing / thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs su dmyigs shing / dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /tshor bar dmyigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /'du shes su dmyigs shing /
31b3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ 'du byed du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rnam par shes par dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /myig du dmigs shing
31b4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rna bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /snar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /lcer dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba
31b5('bum): skyed do/ /lus su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /yid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /gzugs su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
31b6('bum): lta ba skyed do/ /sgrar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /drir dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /ror dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /reg du dmigs
31b7('bum): shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /chos su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /mig gi rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /
31b8('bum): sna'i rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ lce'i rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ lus kyi rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed
32a1('bum): do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes par dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg par dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg par
32a2('bum): dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ sna'i 'dus te reg par dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /
32a3('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar dmigs shing
32a4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i
32a5('bum): tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed
32a6('bum): do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /sa'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /chu'i khams su dmigs shing
32a7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /me'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rlung gi khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /nam mkha'i khams su dmigs
32a8('bum): shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /ma rig pa dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /'du byed du dmigs shing /
32b1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /mying dang gzugs su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /skye mched drug du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i
32b2('bum): tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /sred par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /len par dmigs
32b3('bum): shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /srid par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /skye bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rga shir dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /
32b4('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i
32b5('bum): tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu
32b6('bum): phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /nang stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /phyi stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid
32b7('bum): du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /chen po stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /don dam pa stong pa
32b8('bum): nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /mtha'
33a1('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing
33a2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du
33a3('bum): dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa
33a4('bum): nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba
33a5('bum): skyed do/ /yang dag par spong bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /dbang por dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /
33a6('bum): stobs su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/ /'phags pa'i lam lag brgyad par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul
33a7('bum): gyis lta ba skyed do/ /'phags pa'i bden par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /bsam gtan du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /tshad med par dmigs shing /
33a8('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rnam par thar par dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /
33b1('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par dmigs shing / dmigs
33b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /mngon par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /ting nge 'dzin du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /gzungs kyi sgor dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /
33b3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /myi 'jigs par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /so so yang dag par rig par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /byams pa chen
33b4('bum): por dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /snying rje chen por dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba
33b5('bum): skyed do/ /sems can yongs su smin par bya bar dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /byang chub tu dmigs
33b6('bum): shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /sangs rgyas su dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /chos su dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /dge 'dun du dmigs
33b7('bum): shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i
33b8('bum): tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor bar lta ba dang / 'du shes su lta ba dang / 'du byed du lta ba dang /
34a1('bum): rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir mig tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna bar lta ba dang / snar lta ba dang / lcer lta ba dang / lus su lta ba dang / yid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir gzugs
34a2('bum): su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sgrar lta ba dang / drir lta ba dang / ror lta ba dang / reg tu lta ba dang / chos su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i
34a3('bum): rnam par shes par lta ba dang / sna'i rnam par shes par lta ba dang / lce'i rnam par shes par lta ba dang / lus kyi rnam par shes par lta ba dang / yid kyi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg
34a4('bum): par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg par lta ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg par lta ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg par lta ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg par lta ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i
34a5('bum): phyir mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta
34a6('bum): ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir sa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chu'i khams su lta ba dang / me'i khams
34a7('bum): su lta ba dang / rlung gi khams su lta ba dang / nam mkha'i khams su lta ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir ma rig par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'du byed du lta ba dang / rnam par shes par lta ba dang /
34a8('bum): ming dang gzugs su lta ba dang / skye mched drug du lta ba dang / reg par lta ba dang / tshor bar lta ba dang / sred par lta ba dang / len par lta ba dang / srid par lta ba dang / skye bar lta ba dang / rga shir lta bar 'gyur ba
34b1('bum): yin/ de'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
34b2('bum): tu phyin par lta ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir nang stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ phyi stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / phyi nang
34b3('bum): stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / mtha' las
34b4('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong
34b5('bum): pa nyid du lta ba dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag
34b6('bum): par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yang dag par spong par lta ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par lta ba dang / dbang por lta ba dang / stobs su lta ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag du lta ba dang / lam du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/
34b7('bum): de'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ bsam gtan du lta ba dang / tshad med par lta ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba dang / rnam par thar par lta ba dang / mthar gyis
34b8('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par lta ba dang / mngon par shes par lta ba dang / ting nge 'dzin du lta ba dang / gzungs kyi sgor
35a1('bum): lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ myi 'jigs par lta ba dang / so so yang dag par rig par lta ba dang / snying rje chen por lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
35a2('bum): ma 'dres par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir sems can yongs su smyin par bya bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar lta ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba dang / sangs rgyas su lta ba dang / chos su lta ba dang /
35a3('bum): dge 'dun du lta ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar lta ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas
35a4('bum): pas lta ba'i rnam pa de dag spang pa'i phyir myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du/ byang chub sems dpa'
35a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod spobs pa skyed cig /rab 'byor kyis
35a6('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems de lta bu la yang chags pa ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'
35a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de ni zag pa ma mchis shing khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa ste/ de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum gyi
35a8('bum): khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa'i sems de la yang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi slad du chags pa ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i grangs su mchi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la
35b1('bum): 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mongs ma yin pa'i sems gang yin/ rab 'byor kyis
35b2('bum): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad/ chos gang yang skye bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / 'gag pa dang / 'phel ba dang 'grib pa dang 'ong ba dang 'gro ba
35b3('bum): dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang la skye ba med cing / 'gag pa myed pa dang / 'phel ba myed cing 'grib pa myed pa dang / 'ong ba myed cing 'gro ba myed pa
35b4('bum): dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed cing rnam par byang ba myed pa de la nyan thos kyi sems myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi sems myed do/ /byang chub kyi sems myed do/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems myed do/ /tshe dang ldan sha ra dwa ti'i bu
35b5('bum): 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / thun mongs ma yin pa'i sems so/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang khyod
35b6('bum): kyis 'di skad du/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa myed pa/ khongs su chud pa myed pa / de lta bu'i sems la yang chags pa myed do/ /zhes smras pa de ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de bas na
35b7('bum): gzugs kyang chags pa myed do/ /tshor ba yang chags pa myed do/ /'du shes kyang chags pa myed do/ /'du byed kyang chags pa myed do/ /rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do/ /myig kyang chags pa myed do/ /rna ba yang chags pa
35b8('bum): myed do/ /sna yang chags pa myed do/ /lce yang chags pa myed do/ /lus kyang chags pa myed do/ /yid kyang chags pa myed do/ /gzugs kyang chags pa myed do/ /sgra yang chags pa myed do/ /dri yang chags pa myed do/ /ro yang chags
36a1('bum): pa myed do/ /reg kyang chags pa myed do/ /chos kyang chags pa myed do/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do/ /

36a6('bum): kyang chags pa myed do/ /rlung gi khams kyang chags pa myed do/ /nam mkha'i khams kyang chags pa myed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang chags pa myed do/ /ma rig pa yang chags pa myed do/ /'du byed kyang chags pa myed do/ /

38a6('bum): bsam gtan rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /tshad myed pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /mthar gyis gnas
38a7('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yang chags pa myed do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /ting nge 'dzin
38a8('bum): rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /so so yang dag par rig par rnams kyang chags pa
38b1('bum): myed do/ /snying rje chen po yang chags pa myed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /thams cad shes pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
38b2('bum): pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ /smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad du/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de yang zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor der yang ma zad de/
38b3('bum): byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyi rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa
38b4('bum): nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /rab 'byor kyis smras pa de yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /
38b5('bum): nyan thos rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /sangs rgyas
38b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de lta yin na/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs
38b7('bum): su chud pa myed do/ /tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /'du shes kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /'du byed kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa
38b8('bum): myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /myig kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /rna ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi
39a1('bum): phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /sna yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /lce yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /lus

48a6('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med pa yang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med pa yang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /
48a7('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med pa yang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid med pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid med pa
48a8('bum): yang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med pa yang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /mi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid med pa yang mi
48b1('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med pa yang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa yang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /dngos po med
48b2('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa yang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa med pa yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /yang dag par spong ba med
48b3('bum): pa yang yang dag par spong ba rnams la chags pa med do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis rkang pa med pa yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /dbang po med pa yang dbang po rnams la chags pa med do/ /stobs med pa
48b4('bum): yang stobs rnams la chags pa med do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag med pa yang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la chags pa med do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed pa yang 'phags pa'i lam
48b5('bum): yan lag brgyad pa la chags pa med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa med pa yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /bsam gtan med pa yang bsam gtan rnams la chags pa med do/ /tshad med pa
48b6('bum): med pa yang tshad med pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa yang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /rnam par thar pa med pa yang
48b7('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa yang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
48b8('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa med pa med pa yang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la chags pa med do/ /mngon
49a1('bum): par shes pa med pa yang mngon par shes pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /ting nge 'dzin med pa yang ting nge 'dzin rnams la chags pa med do/ /gzungs kyi sgo med pa yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la chags
49a2('bum): pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs med pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la chags pa med do/ /mi 'jigs pa med pa yang mi 'jigs pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /so so yang dag par
49a3('bum): rig pa med pa yang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /byams pa chen po med pa yang byams pa chen po la chags pa med do/ /snying rje chen po med pa yang snying rje chen po la chags pa med do/ /
49a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /thams cad shes pa nyid med pa yang thams cad shes pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
49a5('bum): med pa yang lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med pa yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
49a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma
49a7('bum): yin pa'i sems des kyang chos thams cad la dmigs pa med pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do/ /mngon par chags par 'gyur ba med pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes
49a8('bum): bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang
49b1('bum): spobs pa skye'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ gang po khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig /gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can lags te/ bcom ldan
49b2('bum): 'das de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can lags la/ de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i sems can lags pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /
49b3('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po bgos shes bya/
49b4('bum): gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can nyung zad nyi tse'i zhig gi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa
49b5('bum): yongs su gtong ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / /sems can nyung zad nyi tse'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / tshul khrims
49b6('bum): srung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing tshul khrims srung ngo / /sems can nyung zad nyi tse'i phyir/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / bzod pa sgom pa ma
49b7('bum): yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / bzod pa sgom mo/ /sems can nyung zad nyi tse'i phyir/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / brtson 'grus rtsom
49b8('bum): pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don tu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems can nyung zad nyi tse'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
50a1('bum): gnas shing / bsam gtan skyed pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams can kyi don du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / bsam gtan skyed do/ /sems can nyung zad nyi tse'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha
50a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / shes rab sgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab sgom mo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
50a3('bum): sems can 'di snyed cig phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar myi bya'o zhe 'am/ sems can 'di
50a4('bum): snyed cig ni byang chub tu dgod par bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub tu dgod par mi bya'o zhes sems can yongs su dpags pas go cha mi gyon gyi/ byang chu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems
50a5('bum): can thams cad kyi don tu go cha chen po gyon to/ /de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar
50a6('bum): bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang bzod
50a7('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par
50a8('bum): bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams
50b1('bum): cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /
50b2('bum): bdag gis kyang nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang nang stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang
50b3('bum): phyi stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs
50b4('bum): su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang chen po stong
50b5('bum): pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang 'dus byas
50b6('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can
50b7('bum): thams cad kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
50b8('bum): nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang
51a1('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems
51a2('bum): can thams cad kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /
51a3('bum): bdag gis kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su
51a4('bum): rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang
51a5('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang dngos
51a6('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi
51a7('bum): la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang yang dag par spong pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang yang dag par spong
51a8('bum): ba bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang dbang po lnga la gnas par bya'o/ /
51b1('bum): sems can thams cad kyang dbang po lnga la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang stobs lnga la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang stobs lnga la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la gnas
51b2('bum): par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i lam
51b3('bum): yan lag brgyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang bsam
51b4('bum): gtan rnams la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan rnams la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang tshad med pa rnams la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang tshad med pa rnams la
51b5('bum): sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag
51b6('bum): kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par bya'o/ /
51b7('bum): sems can thams cad kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas par bya'o/ /
51b8('bum): sems can thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams
52a1('bum): cad kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang gzungs
52a2('bum): kyi sgo rnams la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad
52a3('bum): kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang myi 'jigs bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang so so yang dag
52a4('bum): par rig pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang snying rje chen po la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang snying
52a5('bum): rje chen po la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o/ /zhes
52a6('bum): bya bar sems bskyed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
52a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de dag /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyis/ rnam pa
52a8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas yongs su gtong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
52b1('bum): bsngo ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
52b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i don tu yongs su myi bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems
52b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
52b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
52b5('bum): phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa
52b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus nyam par myi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong
52b7('bum): ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
52b8('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la byas pas sems rtse gcig tu byed cing / de la dmigs pa gcig pa'i phyir/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems skyed pa rnams kyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems
53a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
53a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes
53a3('bum): nye bar gnas te/ des sbyin pa yang mi dmigs/ gtong pa yang mi dmigs/ len pa yang mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa
53a4('bum): yongs su gtong ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
53a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa de dag mtshan mar mi byed cing mi dmigs pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i go cha chen po bgos par shes par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha
53a6('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de/ sems
53a7('bum): can thams cad dang mthun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
53a8('bum): pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
53b1('bum): pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang mos pa mi skyed na/ so so'i skye bo'i sa lta smos kyang mi smos pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
53b2('bum): spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi
53b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la bzod pa dang mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /
53b4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyam
53b5('bum): par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
53b6('bum): chen po rnams pa mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing gnas pa'i tshe/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyi go mi 'byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang /
53b7('bum): sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam
53b8('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
54a1('bum): yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing / tshul khrims des rloms sems su mi byed de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir
54a2('bum): tshul khrims de yang mi dmigs shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
54a3('bum): dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de
54a4('bum): ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i
54a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems
54a6('bum): can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha
54a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa
54a8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub
54b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
54b2('bum): pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
54b3('bum): pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
54b4('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyam par myi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
54b5('bum): phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
54b6('bum): la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan
54b7('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa'i pha rol tu
54b8('bum): phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bzod pa des rlom sems su mi byed cing / bzod pa mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
55a1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ta dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs
55a2('bum): su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
55a3('bum): yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
55a4('bum): byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
55a5('bum): dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dag ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing / dge
55a6('bum): ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha
55a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
55a8('bum): bas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa dang mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /
55b1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus
55b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can thams cad kyi don tu brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed cing / brtun mi ngas pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson
55b3('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
55b4('bum): ma yin gyi/ rnams pa mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan
55b5('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
55b6('bum): la bya bas/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ brtson 'grus des rloms sems su mi byed cing / brtson 'grus de yang mi dmigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing
55b7('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha
55b8('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o/ /
56a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/
56a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/
56a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
56a4('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims yongs su
56a5('bum): srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
56a6('bum): chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan
56a7('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa yongs su sgom
56a8('bum): ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
56b1('bum): spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad
56b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed de/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang / sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /
56b3('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /
56b4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
56b5('bum): ba la sems rtse gcig tu byed de/ de la dmigs pa gcig pa'i phyir/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba rnams gyi go mi 'byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang
56b6('bum): sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam
56b7('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi
56b8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bsam gtan des kyang rloms sems su myi byed cing / bsam gtan de yang mi
57a1('bum): dmigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang / sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems
57a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
