57a3('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin to/ /de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
57a4('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/
57a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang / sems can thams cad
57a6('bum): dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
57a7('bum): spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
57a8('bum): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims yongs su
57b1('bum): srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
57b2('bum): chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
57b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos
57b4('bum): de dag la de ltar bzod pa la mos shing rten te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/
57b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang /
57b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/
57b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ /
57b8('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
58a1('bum): pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
58a2('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid las bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas
58a3('bum): te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol
58a4('bum): tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas
58a5('bum): pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid las bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ shes rab kyi pha
58a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems su mi byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di
58a7('bum): ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nam byang chub
58a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag dang / sems can dang / byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed
58b1('bum): mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi go cha chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub
58b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa re re la gnas shing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
58b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang mnyam par gzhag ste/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang /
58b4('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ro myong bar mi byed do/ /bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi 'phrogs te/
58b5('bum): bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
58b6('bum): po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang 'grogs pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang /
58b7('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la dben pa mthong ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mthong bas mnyam par gzhog ste/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye/
58b8('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du yang mi byed de/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon to/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
59a1('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// //
59a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po lnga pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha chen po bgos pa la shar phyogs
59a3('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing / ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams
59a4('bum): che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyind par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /rdzu
59a5('bum): 'phrul gyis rnams par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa
59a6('bum): rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing / ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig
59a7('bum): sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten
59a8('bum): gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing / ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig
59b1('bum): na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa
59b2('bum): mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ /byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing mying yongs su sgrog pa
59b3('bum): mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
59b4('bum): dag par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ /byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/
59b5('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing mying yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
59b6('bum): chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyind par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad
59b7('bum): cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs
59b8('bum): pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing mying yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha
60a1('bum): chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ /lho nub gyi phyogs
60a2('bum): 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing mying yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang
60a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs
60a4('bum): rjes su sgrog go/ /nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing mying yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/
60a5('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul
60a6('bum): gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ /'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing mying
60a7('bum): yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /
60a8('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod
60b1('bum): pa ched du brjod cing mying yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing
60b2('bum): yongs su dag par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par
60b3('bum): zhugs shes bya/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang yin/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod de/
60b4('bum): de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben sdig to myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la
60b5('bum): nye bar bsgrub te gnas so/ /de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa myed pa/ rnam par dpyod pa myed pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i
60b6('bum): dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa
60b7('bum): rnams kyi de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal ba
60b8('bum): yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid myi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang myed/ sdug bsngal yang myed pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /
61a1('bum): de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ myi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ bcugs med pa/ gnod pa myed pa/ ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos
61a2('bum): kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ namakha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /da snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ bcugs
61a3('bum): myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa/ ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ namakha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par
61a4('bum): byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ myi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ gcugs myed pa/ ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten
61a5('bum): chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ namakha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu
61a6('bum): yangs pa/ myi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ bcugs myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa/ ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ namakha'i mthas gtugs
61a7('bum): pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs
61a8('bum): kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ namakha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ namakha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnams pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang
61b1('bum): dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes par mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrub te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ chung zad ma yod
61b2('bum): do zhes chung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du chung zad myed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
61b3('bum): gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad myed pa 'di dag dang / gzugs
61b4('bum): myed pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
61b5('bum): dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben/ sdig to myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa
61b6('bum): las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/
61b7('bum): rnam par rtog pa myed pa/ rnam par dpyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas/
61b8('bum): dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed
62a1('bum): pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang myed/ sdug bsngal yang
62a2('bum): myed pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ bcugs myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa/
62a3('bum): ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ namakha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de snying rje dang ldan
62a4('bum): pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ myi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ bcugs myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa/ ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ namakha'i
62a5('bum): mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ bcugs myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa/
62a6('bum): ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de mi dmigs
62a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ bcugs myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa/ ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig
62a8('bum): rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtug pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das
62b1('bum): te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la myi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams
62b2('bum): cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnams shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas
62b3('bum): skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes chung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du chung zad myed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du
62b4('bum): shes myed myin skye mched la mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan
62b5('bum): 'di dag dang / tshad myed pa 'di dag dang / gzugs myed pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo
62b6('bum): ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben sdig to myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/
62b7('bum): dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud
62b8('bum): gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa myed pa/ rnam par dpyod pa myed pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang
63a1('bum): bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/
63a2('bum): dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid myi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang myed/ sdug
63a3('bum): bsngal yang myed pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ myi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ bcugs myed pa/ gnod
63a4('bum): pa myed pa/ ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ namakha'i mthas gtug pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /
63a5('bum): de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ myi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ bcugs myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa/ ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings
63a6('bum): kyis klas pa/ namakha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad myed
63a7('bum): pa/ bcugs myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa/ ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par
63a8('bum): bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ bcugs myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa/
63b1('bum): ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ namakha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de myi dmyigs pa'i
63b2('bum): tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ myi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ bcugs myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa/ ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms
63b3('bum): pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las
63b4('bum): yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la myi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad
63b5('bum): du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha'
63b6('bum): yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ chung zad ma yod do zhes chung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du chung zad myed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/
63b7('bum): 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te nam byang chub sems dpa'
63b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad myed pa 'di dag dang / gzugs myed pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnams pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba'i
64a1('bum): tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas
64a2('bum): dben/ sdig to myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrub te gnas so/ /de rnam par rtog pa
64a3('bum): dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa myed pa/ rnam par dpyod pa myed pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can
64a4('bum): bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing / shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyi myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de
64a5('bum): la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa/ btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrub te gnas so/ /de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang
64a6('bum): spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid myi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang myed/ sdug bsngal yang myed pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de byams pa dang ldan
64a7('bum): pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ myi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ bcugs myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa/ ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/
64a8('bum): namakha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ bcugs med pa/
64b1('bum): gnod pa myed pa/ ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par
64b2('bum): spyod do/ /de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ myi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ bcugs myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/
64b3('bum): 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems
64b4('bum): rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ myi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ bcugs pa myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa/ ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/
64b5('bum): namakha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams
64b6('bum): nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la myi byed pas/ namakha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha'
64b7('bum): yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnams shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las
64b8('bum): yang dag par 'das te/ chung zad ma yod do zhes chung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du chung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du
65a1('bum): shes med myin skye mched la mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
65a2('bum): po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad myed pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
65a3('bum): pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i
65a4('bum): chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa
65a5('bum): nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par dpyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar
65a6('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las 'dod chags dag bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing / shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyi myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde
65a7('bum): ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o/ /zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde
65a8('bum): ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal yang med pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems
65b1('bum): rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ bcugs pa myed pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i
65b2('bum): mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ bcugs pa med pa/ gnod pa med
65b3('bum): pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /
65b4('bum): de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ bcugs pa med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas
65b5('bum): pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis
65b6('bum): pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas
65b7('bum): par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi
65b8('bum): byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes
66a1('bum): pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ chung zad ma yod do zhes chud zad myed pa'i
66a2('bum): skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du chung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /
66a3('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad myed pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang /
66a4('bum): tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /
66a5('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la
66a6('bum): nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa myed pa/ rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin
66a7('bum): las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las 'dod chags dag bral bas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba
66a8('bum): lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba yang
66b1('bum): spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal yang med pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /
66b2('bum): de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ bcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings
66b3('bum): kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ bcugs
66b4('bum): med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par
66b5('bum): byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ bcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms
66b6('bum): pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan
66b7('bum): pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ bcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas
66b8('bum): pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams
67a1('bum): nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du namakha'
67a2('bum): mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched
67a3('bum): las yang dag par 'das te/ chung zad ma yod do zhes chung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du chung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes
67a4('bum): med min skye mched la mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan
67a5('bum): 'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
67a6('bum): du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po
67a7('bum): la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ myi gnyis pa/ tshad med
67a8('bum): pa/ bcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyi klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang
67b1('bum): ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ bcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/
67b2('bum): 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis
67b3('bum): pa/ tshad med pa/ bcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu
67b4('bum): rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ bcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/
67b5('bum): yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de 'dod pas dben/
67b6('bum): sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam par rtog
67b7('bum): pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongasu dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis
67b8('bum): pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las 'dod chags dag bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyi myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/
68a1('bum): bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang /
68a2('bum): yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal yang med pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du
68a3('bum): gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la myi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
68a4('bum): mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar
68a5('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ chung zad ma yod do/ zhes chung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams
68a6('bum): cad du chung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes med myin skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin te/
68a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas/ nyon mongs pa rab tu spang ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang /
68a8('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gzhan la brjod cing 'chad pa dang / ston cing 'grel la rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed de/ de dag gi nga ro dang / de dag gi skyon dang / 'byung ba yang tshul
68b1('bum): bzhin du ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
68b2('bum): de dag gis/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang yang 'di lta ste/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa
68b3('bum): yang rung ste/ sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma nyams pa'o/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
68b4('bum): dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam ste/ /
68b5('bum): sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to/ /snyam du sems shing yid la bya ba de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rtog pa dang / sems shing khong du chud par byed pa 'di ni/ byang
68b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang /
68b7('bum): tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir/ brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed pa 'di
68b8('bum): ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
69a1('bum): bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang yang / nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems
69a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang po'i yan lags
69a3('bum): dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa'i yan lags dang / bsam gtan gsum pa'i yan lags dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i yan lags dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / nam mkha'
69a4('bum): mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / chung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med myin skye mched de dag mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag
69a5('bum): med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
69a6('bum): par 'jug pa de dag mi dmyigs shing / de dag gis rlom sems med pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni/ byang chub sems
69a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ rnam pa thams cad
69a8('bum): du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par spong ba bzhi bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du dbang po lnga bsgom pa dang /
69b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad du stobs lnga bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi yan lags bdun bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i
69b2('bum): bden pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du bsam gtan rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du tshad med pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom
69b3('bum): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
69b4('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom
69b5('bum): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du mi 'jigs pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa
69b6('bum): thams cad du byams pa chen po bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du snying rje chen po bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du thams cad shes pa nyid
69b7('bum): bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgom pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
69b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / bdag gis sems can thams
70a1('bum): cad yongs su bskyab par bya'o zhes de la gzhol bar byed do/ /snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / snying brtse ba'i nyams su byed do/ /dga' ba'i ting nge
70a2('bum): 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / bdag nyid kyis dgrol bar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la sems so/ /btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / sems can rnams kyi zag pa zad par bya ba la
70a3('bum): rab tu gzhol bar byed de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang /
70a4('bum): tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan ma la mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba ma gtogs par/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba 'di
70a5('bum): ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma nyams pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang /
70a6('bum): tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres par rnam par spyod cing / sa gnyis po nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'dod pa mi skyed kyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
70a7('bum): nyid du mos shing dga' ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
70a8('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu spangs pa dang / dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i don du/ brtson 'grus mi gtong bas rnam par spyod pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
70b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
70b2('bum): pa 'di dag la yang mnyam par gzhog la/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jugs pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye zhing / de dag gi ro myong bar byed pa yang med la/ de dag gis 'phrogs par
70b3('bum): yang mi 'gyur ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
70b4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyom par 'jug pa de dag la yang mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang la/ de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang /
70b5('bum): bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med par yang dag par 'jug par mi
70b6('bum): byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa
70b7('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ nang stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyi ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid
70b8('bum): shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs
71a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs
71a2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i
71a3('bum): tshul gyis ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ mi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i
71a4('bum): tshul gyis ma yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs
71a5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
71a6('bum): chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ chos thams cad la sems rnam par mi 'khrug cing mnyam par bzhag par shes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po
71a7('bum): 'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug /mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / bde zhes bya bar shes pa
71a8('bum): mi 'jug / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / bdag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug /bdag med ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / sdug ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug /mi sdug ces bya bar shes pa mi
71b1('bum): 'jug pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
71b2('bum): chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'dod pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ gzugs dang gzugs myed pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed la/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mi shes
71b3('bum): pa yang med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
71b4('bum): theg pa chen po ni/ 'jig rten pa'i chos la yang shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas kyi chos dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos la shes pa 'jug par
71b5('bum): mi byed kyang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mi shes pa yang med/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyang mi shes pa med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan
71b6('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen
71b7('bum): po la gnas shes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang
71b8('bum): des sbyin pa yang mi dmigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmyigs/ len pa yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmyigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
72a1('bum): dpa' chen po mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
72a2('bum): tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des tshul khrims kyang mi dmigs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang
72a3('bum): mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
72a4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des bzod pa yang mi dmigs/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang
72a5('bum): chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas shes
72a6('bum): bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des brtson 'grus kyang mi
72a7('bum): dmigs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
72a8('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
72b1('bum): la yang dag par gnas kyang / des bsam gtan yang mi dmigs/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems
72b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
72b3('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des dge ba'i chos kyang mi dmigs shing / mi dge ba dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas
72b4('bum): dang / 'dus ma byas dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs shing shes rab kyang mi dmigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi
72b5('bum): dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
72b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad
72b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma 'dres
72b8('bum): pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi
73a1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid bsgom
73a2('bum): mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
73a3('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas
73a4('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi
73a5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
73a6('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
73a7('bum): sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
73a8('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma 'dres pas bsgom
73b1('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu/ de mi
73b2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed
73b3('bum): pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad
73b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang
73b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi sgom
73b6('bum): mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
73b7('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas
73b8('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dbang po lnga sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs
74a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis stobs lnga sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom
74a2('bum): mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
74a3('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam
74a4('bum): par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan bzhi bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshad myed
74a5('bum): pa bzhi sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
74a6('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa brgyad sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres
74a7('bum): pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas
74a8('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres
74b1('bum): pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmigs
74b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom mo/ /rnam pa
74b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres
74b4('bum): pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa bzhi bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu/
74b5('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so so yang dag par rigs pa bzhi bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
74b6('bum): snying rje chen po sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad sgom
74b7('bum): mo/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
74b8('bum): dpa' chen pos/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni tha snyad tsam du zad do zhes bya bar shes so/ /gzugs dmigs su myed pa'i phyir gzugs
75a1('bum): shes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /tshor ba dmigs su myed pa'i phyir/ tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /'du shes dmigs su myed pa'i phyir/ 'du shes shes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /
75a2('bum): 'du byed dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir 'du byed ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /rnam par shes pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /myig dmigs su myed pa'i phyir/ myig ces bya ba 'di
75a3('bum): ni mying tsam du zad do/ /rna ba dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rna ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /sna dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ sna zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /lce dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ lce zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /
75a4('bum): lus dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ lus zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /yid dmyigs su med pa'i phyir/ yid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /gzugs dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ gzugs shes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /
75a5('bum): sgra dmigs su myed pa'i phyir/ sgra zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /dri dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ dri zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /ro dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ ro zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /reg dmigs su myed pa'i phyir/ reg
75a6('bum): ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ chos shes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ myig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /rna ba'i rnam
75a7('bum): par shes pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su myed pa'i phyir/ sna'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa dmigs
75a8('bum): su myed pa'i phyir/ lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa dmyigs su myed pa'i
75b1('bum): phyir/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su med pa'i phyir/ rna ba'i
75b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su med pa'i phyir/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya
75b3('bum): ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya
75b4('bum): ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs
75b5('bum): su myed pa'i phyir/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni
75b6('bum): mying tsam du zad do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su
75b7('bum): med pa'i phyir/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba
75b8('bum): 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /sa'i khams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ sa'i khams shes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /chu'i khams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ chu'i khams shes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /mye'i khams dmyigs su
76a1('bum): myed pa'i phyir/ mye'i khams shes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /rlung gi khams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rlung gi khams shes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /nam mkha'i khams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ nam mkha'i khams shes bya ba
76a2('bum): 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams dmigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa'i khams shes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /ma rig pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ ma rig pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /'du byed
76a3('bum): dmigs su myed pa'i phyir/ 'du byed ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /rnam par shes pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /mying dang gzugs dmigs su myed pa'i phyir/ mying dang gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni mying
76a4('bum): tsam du zad do/ /skye mched drug dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ skye mched drug ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /reg pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /tshor ba dmigs su myed pa'i phyir/ tshor ba
76a5('bum): zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /sred pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ sred pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /len pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ len pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /srid pa dmyigs su med pa'i phyir/ srid pa zhes
76a6('bum): bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /skye ba dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ skye ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /rga shi dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rga shi zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmyigs su myed
76a7('bum): pa'i phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
76a8('bum): dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su myed pa'i phyir/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /bsam gtan
76b1('bum): gyis pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying
76b2('bum): tsam du zad do/ /nang stong pa nyid dmigs su myed pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /phyi stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid dmyigs su
76b3('bum): myed pa'i phyir/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /chen po stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/
76b4('bum): chen po stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su myed pa'i phyir/ 'dus byas stong
76b5('bum): pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ mtha' las
76b6('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /thog pa dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i
76b7('bum): phyir/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ chos thams
76b8('bum): cad stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ myi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces
77a1('bum): bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su med pa'i phyir/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di
77a2('bum): ni mying tsam du zad do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dran pa nye bar
77a3('bum): gzhag pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rdzu 'phrul
77a4('bum): gyi rkang pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /dbang po rnams dmigs su myed pa'i phyir/ dbang po lnga zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /stobs rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ stobs lnga zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag
77a5('bum): rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /lam dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /'phags pa'i bden
77a6('bum): pa rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /bsam gtan rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ bsam gtan bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /tshad myed pa rnams dmyigs su
77a7('bum): myed pa'i phyir/ tshad myed pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmyigs su med pa'i phyir/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams
77a8('bum): dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /
77b1('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams dmyigs
77b2('bum): su myed pa'i phyir/ mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ gzungs kyi sgo zhes bya
77b3('bum): ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams dmyigs su med pa'i phyir/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di
77b4('bum): ni mying tsam du zad do/ /so so yang dag par rigs pa rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /snying rje chen po dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ snying rje chen po zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /sangs
77b5('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /de bzhin nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /ma nor ba de
77b6('bum): bzhin nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /chos
77b7('bum): nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ chos nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /chos kyi dbyings dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings shes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /chos kyi gnas nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i
77b8('bum): phyir/ chos kyi gnas nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /chos skyon myed pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ /chos skyon myed pa nyid zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /
78a1('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /byang chub dmyigs su myed ba'i phyir/ byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /sangs rgyas dmyigs su myed pa'i
78a2('bum): phyir/ sangs rgyas shes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /zhes bya bar yang dag par shes te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// //
78a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po drug pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar tu
78a4('bum): mngon par shes pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas shing / sems can yongs su smyin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa dang / rim gror bya ba'i tshul gang la gang 'os pa de dag gis/ sangs
78a5('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las kyang 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i
78a6('bum): theg pa 'di nyid kyi chos nyan to/ /de byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa de la gnas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed/ sems can yongs su smyin par byed kyang /
78a7('bum): de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang myi 'byung / sems can gyi 'du shes kyang myi 'byung / sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang myi 'byung ngo / /de gnyis su myed pa'i sa la gnas shing / lus ji lta bus sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'i mthu yod pa de lta bu'i lus ched du bsams
78a8('bum): shing yongs su 'dzin to/ /de nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par ma gyur gyi bar du/ theg pa de dang nam du yang myi 'bral te/ des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob nas kyang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs
78b1('bum): rgyas thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / myi 'am myi ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor
78b2('bum): ro/ /de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyis khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang yon tan brjod pa
78b3('bum): mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po/ bla na myed pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/
78b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog pa mdzad do/ /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
78b5('bum): 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na myed pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig /rnam
78b6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do/ /zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs rjes su brjod pa mdzad do/ /nub phyogs kyi 'jig
78b7('bum): rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
78b8('bum): theg pa chen po bla na myed pa'i theg pa/ theg pa chen po'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes/
79a1('bum): grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs rjes su brjod pa mdzad do/ /byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gis bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing
