79a2('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na myed pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad
79a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom
79a4('bum): ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na myed pa'i theg pa/ theg pa chen po'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes
79a5('bum): bya ba zhig / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyis
79a6('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
79a7('bum): dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na myed pa'i theg pa/ theg pa chen po'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor
79a8('bum): lo bskor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing /
79b1('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa/ theg pa chen po'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams
79b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do/ /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams
79b3('bum): yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na myed pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
79b4('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do/ /'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom
79b5('bum): ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po/ bla na myed pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa'i zhes bya ba
79b6('bum): zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do/ /steng gi phyogs kyi
79b7('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
79b8('bum): dpa' chen po theg pa chen po/ bla na myed pa'i theg pa/ theg pa chen po'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su
80a1('bum): brjod pa mdzad do/ /de ltar na tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la
80a2('bum): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das go cha chen po bgos so/ /go cha chen po bgos shes bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos shes bgyi ba lags
80a3('bum): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po'i go cha gyon cing 'di lta ste/
80a4('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
80a5('bum): pa'i go cha bgos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi
80a6('bum): go cha bgos/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid
80a7('bum): kyi go cha bgos/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dngos po
80a8('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i go cha bgos/ yang dag par spong pa'i go cha bgos/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i go cha bgos/ dbang
80b1('bum): po'i go cha bgos/ stobs kyi go cha bgos/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi go cha bgos/ lam gyi go cha bgos/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i go cha bgos/ bsam gtan gyi go cha bgos/ tshad myed pa'i go cha bgos/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
80b2('bum): par 'jug pa'i go cha bgos/ rnam par thar pa'i go cha bgos/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i go cha bgos/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i go cha bgos/ mngon par shes pa'i go cha
80b3('bum): bgos/ ting nge 'dzin gyi go cha bgos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi go cha bgos/ myi 'jigs pa'i go cha bgos/ so so yang dag par rig pa'i go cha bgos/ snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
80b4('bum): ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi go cha bgos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i go cha bgos nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'di snang bas rgyas par bkang ste
80b5('bum): shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang
80b6('bum): ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
80b7('bum): snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang
80b8('bum): bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /steng gi
81a1('bum): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
81a2('bum): khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi
81a3('bum): bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam
81a4('bum): pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam
81a5('bum): pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam
81a6('bum): pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems can dmyal ba'i mye'i phung
81a7('bum): po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba'i
81a8('bum): sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag rnam par langs
81b1('bum): nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ byol song gi skye gnas kyi
81b2('bum): sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba'i sgra
81b3('bum): brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas kyi sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des/ byol song gi skye gnas de dag nas rnam
81b4('bum): par ldang ngo / /de dag byol song gi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /des stong gsum gyi stong
81b5('bum): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can rnams kyi gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
81b6('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba
81b7('bum): 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan
81b8('bum): 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /des shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i mye'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad myed
82a1('bum): par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag kyang
82a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des/ sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/
82a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /des lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can
82a4('bum): dmyal ba'i mye'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad myed par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /
82a5('bum): de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des/ sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag
82a6('bum): sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /des nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
82a7('bum): khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i mye'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
82a8('bum): de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des/
82b1('bum): sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de
82b2('bum): dang dag tu skye'o/ /des byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i mye'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
82b3('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/
82b4('bum): dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des/ sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang
82b5('bum): na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /des byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i me'i
82b6('bum): phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad myed par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe sems
82b7('bum): can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag sems can dmyal ba
82b8('bum): de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /des shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jigs rten gyi khams
83a1('bum): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i mye'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
83a2('bum): rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs bsgrog go/ /de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba
83a3('bum): dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs
83a4('bum): shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /des lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i mye'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad
83a5('bum): myed par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba'i sems
83a6('bum): can de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par
83a7('bum): langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye 'o/ /des nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang
83a8('bum): ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i mye'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la
83b1('bum): phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba
83b2('bum): dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs
83b3('bum): shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /des 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i mye'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas
83b4('bum): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang
83b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/
83b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag tu skye'o/ /des steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/
83b7('bum): sems can dmyal ba'i mye'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad myed par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod
83b8('bum): do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des/ sems can dmyal ba de dag
84a1('bum): nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang
84a2('bum): de dag tu skye'o/ /des shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skyes gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye
84a3('bum): gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i
84a4('bum): sgra brjod do dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jigs rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de
84a5('bum): dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/
84a6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /des lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/
84a7('bum): byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad
84a8('bum): zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs bsgrog go/ /de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang /
84b1('bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i
84b2('bum): 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
84b3('bum): rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /des nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i
84b4('bum): sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
84b5('bum): sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/
84b6('bum): dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas
84b7('bum): rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /des byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye
84b8('bum): ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag
85a1('bum): thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang /
85a2('bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas
85a3('bum): rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de
85a4('bum): dang de dag tu skye'o/ /des byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyis khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye
85a5('bum): gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra
85a6('bum): brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol
85a7('bum): gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom
85a8('bum): ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag tu skye'o/ /des shar lho'i phyogs mtsham kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems
85b1('bum): can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal
85b2('bum): lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga'
85b3('bum): ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas
85b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /des lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems
85b5('bum): can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de
85b6('bum): la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde
85b7('bum): ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par
85b8('bum): langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye 'o/ /des nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
86a1('bum): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
86a2('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe byol song gi skyes gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas
86a3('bum): kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i
86a4('bum): 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par lang nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /des 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig
86a5('bum): rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal
86a6('bum): ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe byol song
86a7('bum): gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
86a8('bum): rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs
86b1('bum): shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye 'o/ /des steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye
86b2('bum): gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /
86b3('bum): dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi
86b4('bum): skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs
86b5('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gi lam po che'i bzhi mdor
86b6('bum): 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag gcig mngon par sprul la/ de ltar mngon par sprul nas/ ngan song gi
86b7('bum): sems can de dag la sangs rgyas kyi sgra sgrog / chos kyi sgra sgrog /dge 'dun gyi sgra sgrog par 'gyur la/ de nas sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems can dmyal
86b8('bum): ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs na/ rab 'byor de ci snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po dang / sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can
87a1('bum): gang yang sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par bslang ba yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das
87a2('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams ngan song gsum las yongs su
87a3('bum): bkrol yang sems can gang yang yongs su grol bar byas pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar
87a4('bum): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha bgos pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
87a5('bum): phyin pa la gnas shing / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bai dur+ya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul par byed do/ /de ltar bai dur+ya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul nas/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i srid
87a6('bum): mngon par sprul pa byed do/ /de ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i srid mngon par sprul nas/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas kyi sbyin pa byed do/ /skom 'dod pa rnams la skom gyi sbyin pa byed do/ /bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la
87a7('bum): bzhon pa'i sbyin pa byed do/ /gos 'dod pa rnams la gos kyi sbyin pa byed do/ /me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog gi sbyin pa byed do/ /phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la phreng ba'i sbyin pa byed do/ /spos 'dod pa rnams la spos kyi sbyin
87a8('bum): pa byed do/ /byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa'i sbyin pa byed do/ /mal cha 'dod pa rnams la mal cha'i sbyin pa byed do/ /khyim 'dod pa rnams la khyim gyi sbyin pa byed do/ /'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la 'tsho ba'i sbyin pa byed do/ /yo byad 'dod pa
87b1('bum): rnams la yo byad kyi sbyin pa byed do/ /nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad kyi sbyin pa byed do/ /nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dur+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang /
87b2('bum): dngul 'dod pa rnams la/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dur+ya dang / dung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul gyi sbyin pa byed pa nas/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du sbyin pa byed de/ des de ltar zas
87b3('bum): 'dod pa rnams la zas byin/ bzhon pa 'dod pa la bzhon pa byin/ /skom 'dod pa la skom byin/ gos 'dod pa la gos byin/ me tog 'dod pa la me tog byin/ phreng ba 'dod pa la phreng ba byin/ spos 'dod pa la spos byin/ byug pa 'dod pa la byug
87b4('bum): pa byin/ mal cha 'dod pa la mal cha byin/ khyim 'dod pa la khyim byin/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa la 'tsho ba byin/ yo byad 'dod pa la yo byad byin/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa la nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad byin/ nor bu dang / mu
87b5('bum): tig dang / bai dur+ya dang dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dngul 'dod pa la ni/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dur+ya dang / dung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dngul byin pa nas/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i
87b6('bum): bar du byin nas/ sems can de dag la 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos ston pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/ /sems can de dag gi kyang chos ston pa thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
87b7('bum): pa'i byang chub tu sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gi lam po che'i
87b8('bum): bzhi 'dor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas byin / skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom byin/ bzhon pa 'dod pa
88a1('bum): rnams la ni bzhon pa byin/ gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos byin/ me tog 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog byin/ phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la ni phreng ba byin/ spos 'dod pa rnams la ni spos byin/ byug pa 'dod pa
88a2('bum): rnams la ni byug pa byin/ mal cha 'dod pa rnams la ni mal cha byin/ khyim 'dod pa rnams la ni khyim byin/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la ni 'tsho ba byin/ yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni yo byad byin/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo
88a3('bum): byad 'dod pa rnams la ni nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad byin/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dur+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang dngul 'dod pa rnams la ni/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dur+ya dang / dung dang / man
88a4('bum): shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dngul byin pa nas/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin na/ rab 'byor de la ci snyams du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang la yang
88a5('bum): ci yang byin pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i srid mngon
88a6('bum): par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas byin/ skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom byin/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa byin/ gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos byin/ me tog 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog byin/
88a7('bum): phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la ni phreng ba byin/ spos 'dod pa rnams la ni spos byin/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni byug pa byin/ mal cha 'dod pa rnams la ni mal cha byin/ khyim 'dod pa rnams la ni khyim byin/ 'tsho
88a8('bum): ba 'dod pa rnams la ni 'tsho ba byin/ yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni yo byad byin/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad byin/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dur+ya dang / dung dang /
88b1('bum): man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dngul 'dod pa rnams la ni/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dur+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dngul byin pa nas/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung
88b2('bum): ba'i bar du byin nas/ sems can gang la ci yang byin pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor
88b3('bum): de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
88b4('bum): gnas shing / ched du bsam te skye ba yongs su bzung bas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su skye shing de 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dbang phyug de la gnas nas/ sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la
88b5('bum): rab tu 'god do/ /bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyom par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi
88b6('bum): rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam
88b7('bum): par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
88b8('bum): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la sems can rnams rab tu 'god de/ sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par
89a1('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du chos bstan pa de dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor
89a2('bum): 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs zhig mngon par sprul te/ sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod dam/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
89a3('bum): 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i
89a4('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
89a5('bum): ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzung gyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
89a6('bum): la sems can rnams rab tu bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa yod dam/ bsam gtan bzhi dang /
89a7('bum): tshad med bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang /
89a8('bum): stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad
89b1('bum): dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs
89b2('bum): pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan
89b3('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod de/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad
89b4('bum): med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang
89b5('bum): po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par
89b6('bum): thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
89b7('bum): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang de dag la bkod pa med do/ /rab 'byor de
89b8('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po
90a1('bum): bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
90a2('bum): la sbyor zhing rab tu 'god do/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing rab
90a3('bum): tu 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ brgya la sems can thams cad bdag la rdo dang / dbyig pas brdeg cing mtshon gyis 'debs
90a4('bum): kyang de la bdag gis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam yang bskyed par mi bya'o zhes go cha bgo ba byed cing / sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa de 'dra ba la rab tu 'god par byed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu
90a5('bum): ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi 'dor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar ba dang / rab tu 'god pa byas
90a6('bum): na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhag pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das
90a7('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod
90a8('bum): pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyi de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po
90b1('bum): bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul
90b2('bum): zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba
90b3('bum): dang gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ sems can thams cad lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la yang
90b4('bum): dag par bskul zhing / gzhog go 'god do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun
90b5('bum): du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang lus dang
90b6('bum): sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems
90b7('bum): can tshad med grangs med pa lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar
90b8('bum): bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyi de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
91a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go/ /'god do/ /rab 'byor
91a2('bum): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang / gzhog cing 'god
91a3('bum): pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi chos nyid la gnas shing / chos gang la yang 'khrug pa 'am/ 'khrug pa med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/
91a4('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ de de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog pa dang 'god par byas te/ de ltar yang dag par
91a5('bum): bskul ba rnams kyang / nam bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste
91a6('bum): dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi 'dor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ bsam
91a7('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/
91a8('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
91b1('bum): la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyi de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor
91b2('bum): de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can
91b3('bum): thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can
91b4('bum): thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang / gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang
91b5('bum): yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ tshu rol tam/ pha rol tu mi dmigs te/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
91b6('bum): phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ de de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan
91b7('bum): po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul te
91b8('bum): bzhag cing bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/
92a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod
92a2('bum): kyang / sems can gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyi de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang
92a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chur sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos shing / shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung
92a4('bum): gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig 'dod pa de dag thams cad kyang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang
92a5('bum): dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang tshul khrims kyi pha
92a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang /
92a7('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa
92a8('bum): de dag thams cad kyang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/
92b1('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
92b2('bum): gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /'di ltar ste pha rol tu
92b3('bum): phyin pa drug po 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston to/ /sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam
92b4('bum): yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na
92b5('bum): sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams
92b6('bum): de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/
92b7('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go/ /'god do/ /ji ltar bdag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de
92b8('bum): bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag bsam gtan gyi pha
93a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /
93a2('bum): ji ltar bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul
93a3('bum): zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /'di lta ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston te/ sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/
93a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten
93a5('bum): gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de
93a6('bum): bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag bzod pa'i
93a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar
93a8('bum): bdag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing
93b1('bum): gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
93b2('bum): phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / shes rab
93b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /'di lta ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid kyi chos kyang bston te/ sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
93b4('bum): mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
93b5('bum): la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag tshul khrims
93b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /
93b7('bum): ji ltar bdag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /
93b8('bum): ji ltar bdag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog
94a1('bum): go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par
94a2('bum): skul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang
94a3('bum): dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /'di lta ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid kyi chos kyang bston te/ /sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma
94a4('bum): rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de
94a5('bum): bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
94a6('bum): la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag bzod pa'i pha
94a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag brtson 'grus
94a8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar
94b1('bum): bdag bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /
94b2('bum): ji ltar bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go
94b3('bum): 'god do/ /'di lta ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid kyi chos kyang bston te/ /sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ pha rol tu
94b4('bum): phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gis bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/
94b5('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa
94b6('bum): de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
94b7('bum): gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
94b8('bum): phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag bsam gtan
95a1('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag
95a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /'di lta ste
95a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston te/ sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /
95a4('bum): lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de
95a5('bum): dag thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de
95a6('bum): dag thams cad kyang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can
95a7('bum): ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems

95b1('bum): de na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/
95b2('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid kyi chos
95b3('bum): kyang ston te/ sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi

95b6('bum): cad kyang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag

97a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /

97a3('bum): nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/
97a4('bum): skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la yang dag par bskul zhing bzhag ste/ bkod par gyur na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu
97a5('bum): des sems can gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bskul zhing bzhag ste/ dkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang
97a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / nub phyogs kyi 'jig
97a7('bum): rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / shar lho'i
97a8('bum): phyogs mtsham gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi
97b1('bum): khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can gang ji snyed yod pa de dag
97b2('bum): thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod na/ sems can gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyi de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor
97b3('bum): de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bdun pa/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
97b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyi rnam par spyod cing / sems skyed pa gzhan gyi go myi 'byed de/ bdag gi sems can 'di snyed cig ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
97b5('bum): pa la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par myi bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par myi bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can 'di snyed

98b8('bum): brgyad la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par myi bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par myi bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
99a1('bum): nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par myi bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni mngon par shes pa lnga la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par myi bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni ting nge 'dzin
99a2('bum): thams cad la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par myi bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par myi bya'o/ /bdag gis

99a5('bum): la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par myi bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par myi bya'o/ /
99a6('bum): bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par myi bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod
99a7('bum): par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par myi bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par myi bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can
99a8('bum): 'di snyed cig ni dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par myi bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par myi bya'o/ /
99b1('bum): bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni lam gyis rnam pa shes pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par myi bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /
99b2('bum): 'di snyed cig ni dgod par myi bya'o/ /zhes bya bar sems bskyed pa'i go myi 'byed kyi de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o/ /tshul khrims
99b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi
99b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o/ /nang stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /phyi stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /chen po stong pa nyid
99b5('bum): la dgod par bya'o/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /
99b6('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
99b7('bum): nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /dran pa
99b8('bum): nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi la dgod par bya'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o/ /dbang po lnga la dgod par bya'o/ /stobs lnga la dgod par bya'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la dgod par bya'o/ /
100a1('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la dgod par bya'o/ /bsam gtan bzhi la dgod par bya'o/ /tshad med pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la dgod par
100a2('bum): bya'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad la dgod par bya'o/ /mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la dgod par bya'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la dgod par bya'o/ /mngon par
100a3('bum): shes pa lnga la dgod par bya'o/ /ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dgod par bya'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la dgod par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la dgod par bya'o/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o/ /so so yang
100a4('bum): dag par rig pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o/ /snying rje chen po la dgod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la dgod par bya'o/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
100a5('bum): bu la dgod par bya'o/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /rnam pa thams
100a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /zhes bya bar sems bskyed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/
100a7('bum): skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa 'di dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod par bya'o/ /stong pa nyid bcwo brgyad la dgod par
100a8('bum): bya'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi la dgod par bya'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o/ /dbang po lnga la dgod par bya'o/ /stobs lnga la dgod par bya'o/ /byang chub kyi yan
100b1('bum): lag bdun la dgod par bya'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la dgod par bya'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o/ /bsam gtan bzhi la dgod par bya'o/ /tshad myed pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
100b2('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad la dgod par bya'o/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la dgod par bya'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la
100b3('bum): dgod par bya'o/ /mngon par shes pa lnga la dgod par bya'o/ /ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dgod par bya'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la dgod par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la dgod par bya'o/ /myi 'jigs
100b4('bum): pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o/ /snying rje chen po la dgod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la dgod par bya'o/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la
100b5('bum): dgod par bya'o/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o/ /lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la dgod par
100b6('bum): bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dgod par bya'o snyams du sems skyed par gyur na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ sems can gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod par
100b7('bum): gyur pa yod dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la dkod par gyur pa yod dam/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi la dkod par gyur pa yod dam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la dkod par gyur pa yod dam/ dbang po lnga la dkod par gyur pa yod dam/ stobs lnga la
100b8('bum): dkod par gyur pa yod dam/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la dkod par gyur pa yod dam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la dkod par gyur pa yod dam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la dkod par gyur pa yod dam/
101a1('bum): bsam gtan bzhi la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/ tshad med pa bzhi la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bkod par gyur
101a2('bum): pa yod dam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/ mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod par
101a3('bum): gyur pa yod dam/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la bkod par gyur
101a4('bum): pa yod dam/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/ snying rje chen po la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/ sangs rgyas kyi ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod par
101a5('bum): gyur pa yod dam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/ dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/ rang byang chub la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/
101a6('bum): lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bkod par gyur pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
101a7('bum): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod par sems bskyed/ stong pa nyid bco brgyad la dgod par sems bskyed/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la dgod
101a8('bum): par sems bskyed/ yang dag par spong pa bzhi la dgod par sems bskyed/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la dgod par sems bskyed/ dbang po lnga la dgod par sems bskyed/ stobs lnga la dgod par sems bskyed/ byang chub gyi yan
101b1('bum): lag bdun la dgod par sems bskyed/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la dgod par sems bskyed/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la dgod par sems bskyed/ bsam gtan bzhi la dgod par sems bskyed/ tshad myed pa bzhi la dgod
101b2('bum): par sems bskyed/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la dgod par sems bskyed/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la dgod par sems bskyed/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la dgod par sems bskyed/ rnam par
101b3('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la dgod par sems bskyed/ mngon par shes pa lnga la dgod par sems bskyed/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dgod par sems bskyed/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la dgod par sems
101b4('bum): bskyed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la dgod par sems bskyed/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi la dgod par sems bskyed/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la dgod par sems bskyed/ snying rje chen po la dgod par sems bskyed/ sangs rgyas
101b5('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la dgod par sems bskyed/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par sems bskyed/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par sems bskyed/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par sems
101b6('bum): bskyed/ dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par sems bskyed/ rang byang chub la dgod par sems bskyed/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la dgod par sems bskyed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par sems bskyed kyang
101b7('bum): sems can gang gi don tu yang sems bskyed pa myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
101b8('bum): po go cha chen po bgos pa shes bya'o/ /rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du go cha
102a1('bum): ma mchis pa'i go cha bgos par rig par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong ngo / /tshor ba tshor bas stong ngo / /'du shes 'du shes kyis stong ngo / /'du byed 'du byed kyis stong ngo / /
102a2('bum): rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /myig myig gis stong ngo / /rna ba rna bas stong ngo / /sna snas stong ngo / /lce lces stong ngo / /lus lus kyis stong ngo / yid yid kyis stong ngo / /gzugs gzugs kyis stong ngo / /sgra sgras stong ngo / /dri dris stong ngo / /ro ros stong
102a3('bum): ngo / /reg reg gis stong ngo / /chos chos kyis stong ngo / /myig gi rnam par shes pa myig gi rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /sna'i rnam par shes pa sna'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /lce'i rnam par
102a4('bum): shes pa lce'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /lus kyi rnam par shes pa lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /myig gi 'dus te reg pa myig gi 'dus te reg pas stong ngo / /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
102a5('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong ngo / /sna'i 'dus te reg pa sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong ngo / /lce'i 'dus te reg pa lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong ngo / /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa lus kyis 'dus te reg pas stong ngo / /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyis 'dus te reg
102a6('bum): pas stong ngo / /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyi tshor bas stong ngo / /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong ngo / /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
102a7('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong ngo / /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong ngo / /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba lus kyis 'dus te
102a8('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyi tshor bas stong ngo / /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong ngo / /sa'i khams sa khams kyis stong ngo / /chu'i khams chu'i
102b1('bum): khams kyis stong ngo / /mye'i khams me'i khams kyis stong ngo / /rlung gi khams rlung gi khams kyis stong ngo / /nam mkha'i khams nam mkha'i khams kyis stong ngo / /rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par shes
102b2('bum): pa'i khams kyis stong ngo / /ma rig pa ma rig pas stong ngo / /'du byed 'du byed kyis stong ngo / /rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /mying dang gzugs mying dang gzugs kyis stong ngo / /skye mched drug skye mched drug gis
102b3('bum): stong ngo / /reg pa reg pas stong ngo / /tshor ba tshor bas stong ngo / /sred pa sred pas stong ngo / /len pa len pas stong ngo / /srid pa srid pas stong ngo / /skye ba skye bas stong ngo / /rga shi rga shis stong ngo / /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
102b4('bum): pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtson 'grus
102b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /nang stong
102b6('bum): pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /chen po stong pa nyid chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /
102b7('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las
102b8('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /chos thams
103a1('bum): cad stong pa nyid chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis
103a2('bum): stong ngo / /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
103a3('bum): nyid kyis stong ngo / /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /yang dag par spong ba rnams yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong ngo / /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
