124a3('bum): gnas dmyigs su med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i
124a4('bum): ting nge 'dzin dang / ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' ltar chags pa myed pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
124a5('bum): 'dzin to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u brgyad do// // de la dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi
124a6('bum): spyod yul la spyod pa ste/ 'di ni dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin des ting nge 'dzin thams cad rgyas btab pa lta bur 'gyur
124a7('bum): ba ste/ 'di ni rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la sing ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rnam par rtse ba ste/
124a8('bum): 'di ni sing ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni zla ba bzang zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /
124b1('bum): de la zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
124b2('bum): to/ /de la chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis mngon par 'phags pa ste/ 'di ni
124b3('bum): chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la chos thams cad kyis phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad
124b4('bum): myi 'gyur ba'i phyag rgyas btab pa ste/ 'di ni chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing
124b5('bum): ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba ste/ 'di ni spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la chos kyis dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge
124b6('bum): 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos kyi dbyings su rtog par 'gro ba ste/ 'di ni chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
124b7('bum): gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan nges par 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
124b8('bum): ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'jig par myi 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting
125a1('bum): nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya la 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar
125a2('bum): rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa ste/ 'di ni ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
125a3('bum): 'dzin to/ /de la 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa ste/ 'di ni 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
125a4('bum): 'dzin to/ /de la dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi stobs rnam par 'god pa ste/ 'di ni dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bya
125a5('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad yang dag par 'phags par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni yang dag
125a6('bum): par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la nges pa'i tshig la gdon myi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig
125a7('bum): bstan pa la 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni nges pa'i tshig la gdon myi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la tshig bla dgas la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin
125a8('bum): de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi tshig bla dgas la 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni tshig bla dgas la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
125b1('bum): gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi phyogs rnam par lta ba ste/ 'di ni phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang
125b2('bum): zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la nyam pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe
125b3('bum): na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad nyam par myi 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni nyam pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya
125b4('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'du zhing khongs su chud par 'dod pa ste/ 'di ni chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /
125b5('bum): de la nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa ste/ 'di ni nam mkha' rgyas par
125b6('bum): 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni
125b7('bum): rdo rje dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ji ltar rgyal mtshan dam pa bzhin du ting nge 'dzin
125b8('bum): thams cad las 'phags pa ste/ 'di ni rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
126a1('bum): ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dbang thob pa ste/ 'di ni dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
126a2('bum): rgyun gyi rjes su ma log par yang dag par zhugs pa ste/ 'di ni rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/
126a3('bum): ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / rdul dang dri ma thams cad rab tu spangs pa'i dbang du gyur cing / ji ltar seng ge'i rgyal po bzhin du dbang thob pas bsgyings pa lta bu ste/ 'di ni seng ge
126a4('bum): rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la snrel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / 'khor ba'i rgyun rnams rgyun gcod par byed pa ste/ 'di ni
126a5('bum): snrel gzhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la nyon mongs pa spong pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dri ma rab tu sel ba ste/
126a6('bum): 'di ni nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad lham me lhan ne lhang nger
126a7('bum): byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la 'tshol ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos gang yang tshol ba myed pa ste/ 'di ni tshol ba myed
126a8('bum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la gnas la brten pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos gang yang gnas la rten par yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni
126b1('bum): gnas la rten pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la sems myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / sems kyang myi 'byung ba rnams kyang myi rgyu ba ste/ 'di ni sems myed pa zhes bya ba'i
126b2('bum): ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la dri ma myed pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgron ma dri ma myed par byed pa ste/ 'di ni dri ma myed pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge
126b3('bum): 'dzin to/ /de la 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / 'od mtha' yas par byed pa ste/ 'di ni 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la 'od byed
126b4('bum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin 'di thob ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od byed pa ste/ 'di ni 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/
126b5('bum): ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la
126b6('bum): gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dag pa mnyam pa nyid 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la 'od dri ma myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
126b7('bum): ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dri ma sel ba ste/ 'di ni 'od dri ma myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi
126b8('bum): dga' ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin
126c1('bum): thams cad kyi sgron ma byed pa ste/ 'di ni glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la zad myi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin
126c2('bum): thams cad zad shes pa dang / zad myi shes pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ 'di ni zad myi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la myi 'pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge
126c3('bum): 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi stobs rab tu thob pa ste/ 'di ni myi 'pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge
126c4('bum): 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi gzi brjid dang / stobs rab tu 'bar bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting
126c5('bum): nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad myi shes par rjes su mthong nas/ rdul tsam yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba de ltar mthong ba ste/ 'di ni zad
126c6('bum): pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la myi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad myi g.yo myi 'gul rab tu myi 'byed/ rlom
126c7('bum): sems su myi byed pa ste/ 'di ni myi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la 'jig pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'jig par
126c8('bum): yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni 'jig pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin
126d1('bum): thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la zla ba dri ma myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams
126d2('bum): cad mun pa myed par byed pa ste/ 'di ni zla ba dri ma myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la shes rab kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ma
126d3('bum): rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la snang ba gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
126d4('bum): ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni snang ba gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge
126d5('bum): 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de
126d6('bum): la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi bya ba rnams byed pa ste/ 'di ni bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la ye shes dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin
126d7('bum): de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ye shes dpal yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni ye shes dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang
126d8('bum): zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong bar khong du chud par byed pa ste/ 'di ni rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
127a1('bum): to/ /de la sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / sems myi g.yo rnam par myi g.yo rnam par myi ldog /yongs su yi 'chad par myi 'gyur/
127a2('bum): nyams su myi bde ba myed la/ de la sems zhes bya ba ni 'di yin zhes bya bar sems myi 'byung ba ste/ 'di ni sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/
127a3('bum): ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / thams cad snang bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la
127a4('bum): gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
127a5('bum): ting nge 'dzin thams cad rin chen mtha' ltar kun nas snang ba ste/ 'di ni rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la
127a6('bum): gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad phyag rgya myed pa'i mthas/ phyag rgyas btab pa nye bar bzung bas phyag rgyas btab par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /
127a7('bum): de la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos gang yang mnyam pa nyid du ma chud pa myed par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni
127a8('bum): chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang chos thams cad
127b1('bum): kyi dga' ba spong pa ste/ 'di ni dga' ba spong pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la chos kyis 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad kyi mun pa sel
127b2('bum): ba dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni chos kyis 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/
127b3('bum): ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad rnam par 'thor ba ste/ 'di ni rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang
127b4('bum): zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa ste/ 'di ni chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la yi ge
127b5('bum): mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yi ge mnyam pa nyid rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i
127b6('bum): ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yi ge gcig kyang dmyigs pa myed pa ste/ 'di ni yi ge dang
127b7('bum): bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la dmyigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dmyig pa 'chad par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni
127b8('bum): dmyigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la 'gyur ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa ste/ 'di ni 'gyur ba myed
128a1('bum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rnam pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad kyi rnam pa tsam yang dmyigs pa myed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa
128a2('bum): myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la nges pa'i mying la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / nges pa'i tshig thams cad ni yang dag par dmyigs su myed cing tha snyad la stos
128a3('bum): pa tsam mo zhes rtog par 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni nges pa'i mying la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la gnas myed par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin
128a4('bum): thams cad kyi gnas dmyigs pa myed pa ste/ 'di ni gnas myed par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rab rib myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams
128a5('bum): cad kyi rab rib rnam par sel ba ste/ 'di ni rab rib myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyod pa yang
128a6('bum): dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la g.yo ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad g.yo ba
128a7('bum): myed par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni g.yo ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams
128a8('bum): cad kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' ba ste/ 'di ni yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas
128b1('bum): shing / chos thams cad dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yon tan gyi tshogs rjes su 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la sems myed par gnas pa zhes bya
128b2('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la sems myi 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni sems myed par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing
128b3('bum): gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba
128b4('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi byang chub kyi yan lag bdun rab tu 'thob pa ste/
128b5('bum): 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la spob pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la spobs pa mtha'
128b6('bum): yas pa rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad
128b7('bum): la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin
128b8('bum): de la gnas shing / khams gsum pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba ste/ 'di ni chos thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la yongs su gcod pa byed pa zhes
129a1('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyun mthong ba ste/ 'di ni yongs su gcod pa byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la
129a2('bum): nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / chos thams cad la nem nur rnam par sel ba rab tu 'thob pa ste/
129a3('bum): 'di ni nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la gnas su bya ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad kyi gnas yang dag par rjes
129a4('bum): su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni gnas su bya ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la cig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos gang yang gnyis su yang dag par rjes
129a5('bum): su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad dang /
129a6('bum): ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/
129a7('bum): ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rnam pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rnam pa 'dor ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
129a8('bum): 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad gnyis su myed par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni rnam pa 'dor ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams
129b1('bum): cad khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad rtogs par byed pa'i ye shes la zhugs nas/ de la zhugs pa'i phyir khong du chud pa gang yang myed pa ste/ 'di ni
129b2('bum): rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la brda' dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi brda' dang
129b3('bum): sgra la 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni brda' dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad yi ge
129b4('bum): dang bral bar rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad gzi brjid kyis
129b5('bum): lham me lhan ne lhang nger byed pa ste/ 'di ni sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la mtshan nyid yongs su spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams
129b6('bum): cad kyi mtshan nyid yongs su dag par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni mtshan nyid yongs su spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la mngon par dmyigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
129b7('bum): ting nge 'dzin thams cad mngon par dmyigs pa med par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni mngon par dmyigs pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i ting nge
129b8('bum): 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /
130a1('bum): de la bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la bde ba dang sdug bsngal yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba
130a2('bum): ste/ 'di ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la zad myi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin
130a3('bum): thams cad zad par rung bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni zad myi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la gzungs kyi blo gros ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas
130a4('bum): shing / gzungs thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni gzungs kyi blo gros shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la
130a5('bum): gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad yang dag pa dang / log par yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa dang / log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la
130a6('bum): 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'gal ba dang 'gog pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/
130a7('bum): 'di ni 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la 'thun pa dang 'gal ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge
130a8('bum): 'dzin thams cad la 'thun pa dang 'gal ba yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni mthun pa dang 'gal ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la 'od dri ma myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge
130b1('bum): 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor myi dmyigs pa ste/ 'di ni 'od dri ma myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de
130b2('bum): la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi snying po yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la zla ba dri ma myed par rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
130b3('bum): gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar yongs su rgyas par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni zla ba dri ma myed par rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i
130b4('bum): ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / dag cing gsal ba'i 'od kyi sems can gyi ris snang bar byas shing mun pa mun nag gi tsha ba'i gdung ba
130b5('bum): sel bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad rgyan chen po
130b6('bum): dang ldan par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams
130b7('bum): cad snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
130b8('bum): ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'khrug pa yang myi dmyigs rtse gcig kyang myi dmyigs pa ste/ 'di ni ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan
131a1('bum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang chos thams cad rdul can dang rdul dang bral bar mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa ste/ 'di ni rdul dang bral cing rdul dang bral ba'i
131a2('bum): tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la nyon mongs pa myed par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad nyon mongs pa
131a3('bum): myed par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni nyon mongs pa myed par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa myed par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i
131a4('bum): ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa myed par yang dag par gzhol ba 'thob par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa
131a5('bum): thams cad nyon mongs pa myed par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la gnas dmyigs su myed pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
131a6('bum): ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi kun gzhi nye bar myi dmyigs pa ste/ 'di ni gnas dmyigs su myed pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la de bzhin nyid la gnas shing / sems myed pa zhes
131a7('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las mi ldog pa ste/ 'di ni de bzhin nyid la gnas shing / sems myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
131a8('bum): 'dzin to/ /de la lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi lus myi dmyigs pa ste/ 'di ni lus kyi
131b1('bum): skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin
131b2('bum): thams cad kyi ngag gi las myi dmyigs pa ste/ 'di ni ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la nam mkha' ltar chags pa myed pas rnam par grol zhing
131b3('bum): gos pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni nam mkha'
131b4('bum): ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o/ /
131b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u dgu'o// // rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi
131b6('bum): ste bzhi gang zhe na/ lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/ /de la lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang zhe na/
131b7('bum): rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyis rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags
131b8('bum): sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par stsal cing / rnam par spyod kyang lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnam la rnam par mi rtog go/ /phyi'i lus la de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can
132a1('bum): shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing / rnam par spyod kyang lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnam la rnam par myi rtog go/ /
132a2('bum): phyi nang gi lus la de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing /
132a3('bum): rnam par spyod kyang lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnam la rnam par myi rtog go/ /nang gi tshor ba la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan
132a4('bum): pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing / rnam par spyod kyang tshor ba dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnam la rnam par mi rtog go/ /phyi'i lus la de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i
132a5('bum): rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod kyang / tshor ba dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog
132a6('bum): pa rnam la rnam par mi rtog go/ /phyi nang gi tshor ba la de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid myi
132a7('bum): bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod kyang / tshor ba dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnam la rnam par myi rtog go/ /nang gi sems la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can
132a8('bum): shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid myi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing / rnam par spyod kyang sems dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnam la rnam par myi rtog go/ /
132b1('bum): phyi'i sems la de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod kyang
132b2('bum): sems dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go/ /phyi nang gi sems la de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/
132b3('bum): 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing / rnam par spyod kyang sems dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par myi rtog go/ /nang gi chos la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
132b4('bum): chos kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid myi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod kyang / chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par
132b5('bum): rtog pa rnams la rnam par myi rtog go/ /phyi'i chos la de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde
132b6('bum): ba rnam par bstsal cing / rnam par spyod kyang chos dang ldan pa rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go/ /phyi nang gi chos la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can
132b7('bum): shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod kyang / chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par myi
132b8('bum): rtog go/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / rnam par spyod pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
133a1('bum): 'gro na 'gro'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /'greng na 'greng ngo zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /'dug na 'dug go zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /nyal na nyal lo zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /de'i lus
133a2('bum): nyams bde ba dang nyams mi bde yang rung ste/ ji lta ji ltar gnas pa/ de lta de ltar des rab tu shes te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nang gi lus la de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul
133a3('bum): gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang
133a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nang gi lus de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod de/ de 'gro 'am 'ong yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ lta 'am rnam par lta
133a5('bum): yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ bskum 'am rkyang yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ sbyar ma dang lhung bzed 'chang zhing spyod kyang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ zos pa dang 'chos pa dang 'thungs pa dang / myangs ba la
133a6('bum): yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ nyal ba dang gnyid kyis mya myo bstsal ba la yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ 'greng ba dang 'dug pa la yang shes
133a7('bum): bzhin du spyod pa yin/ gnyid kyi log gam ma log na yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ smra ba dang myi smra na yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ nang du yang dag par 'jog pa la yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin te/
133a8('bum): rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang gi lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang
133b1('bum): ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran zhing dbugs nang du
133b2('bum): rgyu na yang / dran zhing dbugs nang du rgyu'o/ /zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dran zhing dbugs phyir rgyu na yang / dran zhing dbugs phyir rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dbugs nang du ring du rgyu na yang / dbugs nang du ring du rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes
133b3('bum): so/ /dbugs phyir ring du rgyu na yang / dbugs phyir ring du rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dbugs nang du thung ngu rgyu na yang / dbugs nang du thung ngu rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dbugs phyir thung ngu rgyu na yang / dbugs phyir thung ngu
133b4('bum): rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes ste/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo bskor ba 'am/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i mchan bu mkhas pa ni/ ring du bskor na ring du bskor ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /thung ngu
133b5('bum): bskor na thung ngu bskor ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran par dbugs nang du brgyus na yang / dran par dbugs nang du
133b6('bum): brgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dran par dbugs phyir brgyus na yang dran par dbugs phyir brgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dbugs ring du nang du brgyus na yang / dbugs ring du nang du brgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dbugs
133b7('bum): ring du phyir brgyus na yang / dbugs ring du phyir brgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dbugs thung ngu nang du brgyus na yang / dbugs thung ngu nang du brgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ dbugs thung ngu phyir brgyus na
133b8('bum): yang / dbugs thung ngu phyir brgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
134a1('bum): nang gi lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid myi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam
134a2('bum): par spyod do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus 'di la sa'i khams kyang yod do/ /chu'i khams dang / mye'i khams dang /
134a3('bum): rlung gi khams kyang yod do zhes bya bar khams kyi rnam par yang dag par ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog ste/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ ba lang gi shen pa 'am/ ba lang gi shen pa'i mchan bu mkhas pas mtshon rnon
134a4('bum): po thogs te/ ba lang bsad cing bag bzhir gshags te/ de ltar so sor phye nas/ 'greng ngam 'dug ste/ de la rab tu rtog pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
134a5('bum): spyod pa yang / lus 'di la sa'i khams kyang yod do/ /chu'i khams dang / mye'i khams dang / rlung gi khams kyang yod do zhes bya bar khams kyi rnam pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na/
134a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'greng ngam 'dug ste/ nang gi lus la de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes
134a7('bum): bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid myi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi
134a8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus 'di nyid la rkang pa'i mthil yan cad/ skra dang glad pa man chad du/ sen mo dang spu dang pags pa yan chad du myi gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis gang bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog ste/
134b1('bum): lus 'di la skra dang / spu dang sen mo dang pags pa dang / glog pa dang / sha dang chu ba dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang pa dang / snying dang mkhal ma dang mchin pa dang / glo ba dang / mtsher pa dang / long ka dang / rgyu ma dang / nye ma dang /
134b2('bum): nang rol dang / gcin dang / phyi sa dang / mchi ma dang / rngul dang / tshil dang / snabs dang / ngar snabs dang / rnag dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / chu ser dang / kha chu dang / dri ma dang / glad pa dang / glad rgyas dang rngu ma dang /
134b3('bum): rna spabs dag kyang yod do/ /zhes bya bar yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog ste/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ chun pa'i skye snod til dang / yungs kar dang / sran chung dang / bal sran dang / nas dang gro dang / 'bras dang /
134b4('bum): 'bru sna tshogs kyis gang ba myig dang ldan pa'i myi zhig gis phye ste/ bltas na/ 'di ni til lo/ /'di ni yungs kar ro/ /'di ni sran chung ngo / /'di ni bal sran no/ /'di ni nas so/ /'di ni gro 'o/ /'di ni 'bras so/ /
134b5('bum): 'di dag ni de ma yin pa'i 'bru gzhan no zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang lus 'di nyid la rkang pa'i mthil yan chad/ skra dang spyi bo man chad sen mo dang /
134b6('bum): spu dang / pags pa yan chad du mi gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis gang bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog ste/ lus 'di la skra dang / spu dang / sen mo dang / pags pa dang / glog pa dang / sha dang / chu ba dang / khrag dang /
134b7('bum): rus pa dang / rkang dang / snying dang / mkhal ma dang / mchin pa dang / glo ba dang / mtsher pa dang / long ka dang / rgyu ma dang / gnye ma dang / nang grol dang / gcin dang / phyi sa dang / mchi ma dang / dngul dang / tshil dang / snabs dang /
134b8('bum): ngar snabs dang / rnag dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / chu ser dang / kha chu dang / dri ma dang / glad pa dang / glad rgyas dang / rngu ma dang / rna spabs dag kyang yod do zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog go/ //

135b1('bum): zhag bdun lon pa 'am/ bya rog gam/ khwa 'am/ 'ol ba 'am/ bya rgod dam/ spyang ki 'am/ wa 'am khyi 'am/ de ma yin pa'i srog chags kyi rigs sna tshogs kyis bza' ba mthong ba de'i tshe/ de lus 'di nyid kyi/

138a7('bum): dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sdig to myi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnam myi bskyed pa'i phyir/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mos pa skyed cing rtsol lo/ /brtson 'grus
138a8('bum): rtsom mo/ /sems kyi mthu bskyed do/ /yang dag par smon lam 'debs so/ /sdig to myi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyi mos pa bskyed cing rtsol lo/ /brtson 'grus
138b1('bum): rtsom mo/ /sems kyi mthu skyed do/ /yang dag par smon lam 'debs so/ /dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyi mos pa skyed cing rtsol lo/ /brtson 'grus brtsom
138b2('bum): mo/ /sems kyi mthu bskyed do/ /yang dag par smon lam 'debs so/ /dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang / phyir zhing bsgom pa dang / nyams par myi 'gyur ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/
138b3('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mos pa skyed cing rtsol lo/ /brtson 'grus brtsom mo/ /sems kyi mthu bskyed do/ /yang dag par smon lam 'debs so/ /rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
138b4('bum): chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems
138b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la
138b6('bum): gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa sgom mo/ /brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa

138b8('bum): pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa sgom mo/ /dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/

141a7('bum): nge 'dzin dang / smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ chos thams cad rang gis mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du rtog pa'i tshe/ sems gnas pa stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste 'di ni
141a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ chos thams cad mtshan ma myed par rtog pa'i tshe/ sems gnas pa mtshan ma myed pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste/ 'di ni mtshan myed pa'i

141b4('bum): kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / myi skye ba shes pa dang / chos shes pa dang / rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang / kun rdzob shes pa dang / 'dris pa shes pa dang /
141b5('bum): sgra ji bzhin shes pa'o/ /de la sdug bsngal shes pa gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal myi skye bar shes pa'o/ /de la kun 'byung shes pa gang zhe na/ kun 'byung ba spang bar shes pa'o/ /de la 'gog pa shes pa gang zhe na/
141b6('bum): sdug bsngal 'gog par shes pa'o/ /de la lam shes pa gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes bya'o/ /de la zad pa shes pa gang zhe na/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug zad par shes
141b7('bum): pa'o/ /de la myi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na/ srid pa'i rgyud skye ba myed par shes pa'o/ /de la chos shes pa gang zhe na/ phung po lnga sgyu mar yongs su rtogs shing shes pa'o/ /de la rjes su rtogs pa shes pa gang
141b8('bum): zhe na/ myig myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / rna ba myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / sna myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / lce myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / lus myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa

142b1('bum): myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / mying dang gzugs myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / skye mched drug myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / reg pa myi rtag ces bya bar

142b3('bum): dang / rga shi myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / /de la kun rdzob shes pa gang zhe na/ sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyis sems sems kyis shes pa'o/ /de la 'dris pa shes pa gang zhe na/ gang gis lam shes pa

142b6('bum): shes pa yongs su shes par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes pa'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes pa rtogs pa'i dbang po'o/ /de la yongs su ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya'o/ /
142b7('bum): zhes bya ba'i dbang po gang zhe na/ slob pa'i gang zag mngon par rtogs par ma gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /
142b8('bum): shes rab kyi dbang po yongs su snang bar ma gyur pa 'di ni yongs su ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i dbang po'o/ /de la yongs su shes pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ gang zag slob pa yongs
143a1('bum): su shes par ma gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste 'di ni yongs su shes pa'i dbang
143a2('bum): po zhes bya'o/ /de la yongs su shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ gang zag myi slob pa dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dad pa'i
143a3('bum): dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni yongs su shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor
143a4('bum): 'di yang de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni ting nge 'dzin gsum
143a5('bum): ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa myed pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa myed pa cing dpyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rtog pa dang bcas
143a6('bum): pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pas dben/ sdig to myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben
143a7('bum): pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrub shing gnas te/ 'di ni rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rtog pa myed la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin
143a8('bum): gang zhe na/ bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa'i bar te/ 'di ni rtog pa myed la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la rtog pa myed cing dpyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ bsam gtan
143b1('bum): gnyis pa dang / bsam gtan gsum pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / cung zad
143b2('bum): med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o/ /'di ni myi rtog myi dpyod
143b3('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di yang de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
143b4('bum): chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar rjes su dran pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran
143b5('bum): pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang / skye ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa ste/
143b6('bum): rab 'byor 'di yang de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po
143b7('bum): ni 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/ de la
143b8('bum): bsam gtan bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod pas dben sdig to myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/
144a1('bum): dpyod pa bcas pa dang / dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas/ nang yongs
144a2('bum): su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa myed pa dpyod pa myed pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las
144a3('bum): 'dod chags dang bral bas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms la gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o
144a4('bum): zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid myi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang myed sdug
144a5('bum): bsngal yang myed pa btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/ de dag ni bsam gtan bzhi'o/ /de la tshad myed pa bzhi gang zhe na/
144a6('bum): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ myi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ gcugs myed pa/
144a7('bum): gnod pa myed pa/ ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas
144a8('bum): shing rnam par spyod do/ /de la snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ myi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ gcugs myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa/ ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms
144b1('bum): pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yang
144b2('bum): pa/ myi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ gcugs myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa/ ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas
144b3('bum): gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ myi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ gcugs myed pa/ gnod
144b4('bum): pa myed pa/ ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing myi dmyig
144b5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rnam par spyod do/ /de dag ni tshad myed pa bzhi'o/ /de la gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
144b6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la myi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes
144b7('bum): te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye
144b8('bum): mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa
145a1('bum): thams cad du cung zad myed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dag ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'o/ /
145a2('bum): de la rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gyis gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/ /nang gzugs myed pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas/ phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni
145a3('bum): rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/ /bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna
145a4('bum): tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la myi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang
145a5('bum): dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes te/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/
145a6('bum): chung zad ma yod do zhes chung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du chung zad myed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la nye bar
145a7('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i bar du de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs zhing gnas te
145a8('bum): de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do/ /de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
145b1('bum): 'dod pas dben/ sdig to myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /
145b2('bum): de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud cig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa myed pa/ dpyod pa myed pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan
145b3('bum): gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing / shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas ste/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams
145b4('bum): kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang
145b5('bum): spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid myi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang myed sdug bsngal yang myed pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /
145b6('bum): de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la myi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam
145b7('bum): mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes te/ rnam shes mtha'
145b8('bum): yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ chung zad ma yod do zhes chung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /
146a1('bum): de rnam pa thams cad du chung zad myed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin
146a2('bum): skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i bar du myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/ de dag ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o/ /rab 'byor
146a3('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
146a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gnas la 'ang gnas su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /gnas ma yin pa la 'ang gnas ma yin par yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /'das pa dag ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
146a5('bum): las dang / las yongs su len pa'i rnam par smyin pa/ gnas kyi rnam pa dang / rgyu'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /'jig rten ni khams sna tshogs can te/ 'jig rten ni
146a6('bum): khams du ma'o zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /sems can gzhan dang / gang zag gzhan gyi mos pa sna tshogs dang / mos pa du ma yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /
146a7('bum): sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi dbang po rab dang / tha ma shes par bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /kun tu 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /dbang po dang
146a8('bum): stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta
146b1('bum): ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /de rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran te/ tshe rabs gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/ tshe rabs brgya dang / tshe rabs stong dang / tshe rabs brgya stong dang / tshe rabs bye ba dang / tshe rabs
146b2('bum): bye ba brgya dang / tshe rabs bye ba stong dang / tshe rabs bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dag kyang rjes su dran no/ /bskal pa cig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/ bskal pa brgya dang / bskal
146b3('bum): pa stong dang / bskal pa brgya phrag stong nas/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar dag kyang rjes su dran te/ bdag ni 'di lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug go/ /mying ni 'di zhes bya'o/ /rigs ni 'di zhes bya'o/ /
146b4('bum): rus ni 'di zhes bya'o/ /zas ni 'di za za'o/ /yun ni 'di srid gcig tu gnas gnas so/ /tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig tu gyur te/ de ltar bdag de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig du skyes so zhes bya ba nas/ de nas
146b5('bum): shi 'phos nas kyang 'dir skyes so zhes bya bar rnam pa dang bcas/ sa mal dang bcas/ gtan tshigs dang bcas par rnam pa du mas sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran no/ /lha'i myig rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pas/
146b6('bum): sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dag kyang mthong ngo / /kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog myi sdug pa dang / bzang ba dang ngan pa dang / bde 'gro na 'khod pa dang / ngan song na 'khod pa dang / las ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar 'dod
146b7('bum): pa'i sems can rnams rab tu shes te/ sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa dag gis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyi ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa/ log par
146b8('bum): lta ba dag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas ngan song log par ltung ba sems can dmyal bar skye'o/ /sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid
147a1('bum): kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa myi 'debs pa/ yang dag par lta ba dag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen kyis lus zhig nas/ bde 'gro mtho ris kyi lha'i nang du skye'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /
147a2('bum): zag pa rnams zad pa'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang / shes rab rnam par grol ba zag pa myed pa/ rang gis mngon par shes pas mngon du byas te/ nye bar bsgrubs shing rnam par spyod do/ /bdag gi skye ba ni zad
147a3('bum): do/ /bdag gis tshangs par spyod pa ni spyad do/ /bya ba ni byas so/ /rnam pa 'di lta bu gzhan ni myed do zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ rab 'byor de yang de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
147a4('bum): chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar myi 'jigs pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs par
147a5('bum): sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na/ de la chos 'di rnams mngon par sangs ma rgyas so zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang
147a6('bum): ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang / yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba myed pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par
147a7('bum): spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor kyi nang du sing ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan su yang
147a8('bum): rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar myi nus pa/ bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/ /bdag zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas na/ de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par ma gyur to/ /zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/
147b1('bum): bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su
147b2('bum): mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba myed pa thob pa dang / myi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ /
147b3('bum): tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan su yang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar myi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/ /gang yang
147b4('bum): bdag gis bar chad kyi chos su bstan pa de dag la bsten na/ bar chad kyi chos su myi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas myed de/ de'i phyir bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan su
147b5('bum): yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba myed pa thob
147b6('bum): pa dang / myi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor kyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha
147b7('bum): 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan su yang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar myi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/ /gang bdag gis lam 'phags pa'i 'byung ba rtogs par 'gyur ba de byed pa'i
147b8('bum): sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar bstan pa de dag la nan tan byas na/ sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar myi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba de lta bu'i gnas myed de/ de'i phyir bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram
148a1('bum): ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma
148a2('bum): mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor kyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ /tshangs pa'i
148a3('bum): 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste/ rab
148a4('bum): 'byor 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar
148a5('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ste/
148a6('bum): rab 'byor 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar
148a7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad do/ /bcwo brgyad gang zhe na/ gang gis nam la de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas pa dang / gang gis nam la
148a8('bum): lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur ba'i lam gyis
148b1('bum): rjes su bstan te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul ba mi mnga'o/ /ca co mi mnga'o/ /dgongs pa nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /
148b2('bum): 'du shes sna tshogs mi mnga'o/ /thugs mnyam par ma gzhag pa mi mnga'o/ /ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga'o/ /mos pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /dgongs
148b3('bum): pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /shes rab yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa
148b4('bum): yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /sku'i phrin las thams cad ye shes mngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo / /gsung gi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo / /thugs kyi phrin las
148b5('bum): thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo / /'das pa'i dus la ma thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ /ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug
148b6('bum): go/ /da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug ste/ rab 'byor 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang
148b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams te yi ge mnyam pa nyid dang / brjod pa mnyam pa nyid dang / yi ge'i sgo dang / yi ge la 'jug pa ste/ de la yi ge'i sgo dang / yi ge la 'jug
148b8('bum): pa gang zhe na/ a zhes bya ba ni ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /ra zhes bya ba ni rdul dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /pa zhes bya ba ni don dam pa stong pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /tsa zhes bya ba ni
149a1('bum): 'chi 'pho dang skye ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'chi 'pho dang skye ba med pas/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /na zhes bya ba ni ming dang bral zhing ming gi rang bzhin ma thob ma stor bas chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /la
149a2('bum): zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das shing srid pa'i 'khri shing dang / rgyu dang rkyen yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /da zhes bya ba ni dul ba dang dul ba'i gnas su yongs su nges pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi
149a3('bum): sgo'o/ /pa zhes bya ba ni bcings pa dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /Ta zhes bya ba ni dkrugs ma dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /sa zhes bya ba ni chags pa myi dmyigs pas chags par mi 'gyur/ 'ching
149a4('bum): bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /ba zhes bya ba ni ngag gi lam dang sgra yang dag par chad pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /ta zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /
149a5('bum): ya zhes bya ba ni yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /sta zhes bya ni khengs pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /ka zhes bya ba ni byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i
149a6('bum): phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /sa zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid du mi dmigs pas mnyam pa nyid las mi 'da' ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /ma zhes bya ba ni bdag gir bya ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /
149a7('bum): ga zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /tha zhes bya ba ni gnas mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /dza zhes bya ba ni skye ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /shwa zhes bya ba ni
149a8('bum): dbugs dmigs su myed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /d+ha zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /sha zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /kha zhes
149b1('bum): bya ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pas dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /k+Sha zhes bya ba ni zad pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /Ta zhes bya ba ni sdod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi
149b2('bum): sgo'o/ /dz+nya zhes bya ba ni ye shes dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /rta zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /ha zhes bya ba ni rgyu mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /
149b3('bum): b+ha zhes bya ba ni 'jig pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /tsha zhes bya ba ni mdog mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /sma zhes bya ba ni dran pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /hwa zhes bya ba ni
149b4('bum): bod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /tas zhes bya ba ni mos pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /g+ha zhes bya ba ni sdug pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /tha zhes bya ba ni
149b5('bum): bsgrub pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /ma zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa med pas gang yang 'gro ba med cing 'ong ba med de/ gnas med cing 'dus pa med pa la nyal bar 'gyur ba med pas rnam par mi rtog pa'i
149b6('bum): phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /pha zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /ska zhes bya ba ni phung po dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /yas zhes bya ba ni mi bde ba mi dmigs pa'i
149b7('bum): phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /ce zhes bya ba ni spyod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /ta zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /D+ha zhes bya ba ni g.yog pa mi dmigs pas mtha'
149b8('bum): thug par gnas par 'chi 'pho med cing skye ba med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo ste/ de yan chad yi ge'i tha snyad med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang la yang gang gis tha snyad du bya ba dang / gang gis brjod pa dang / gang gis bstan pa
150a1('bum): dang / gang gis bri ba dang / gang snang ba dang / gang klag par bya ba de lta bu'i mying gang yang myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' bzhin du chos thams cad khong du chud par bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni gzungs
150a2('bum): kyi sgo la 'jug pa a las bstsogs pa'i yi ge bstan pa la 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis a las bstsogs pa'i yi ge la mkhas par bya ba 'di yongs su shes na/ de ni sgra
150a3('bum): gang la yang chags par myi 'gyur te/ thams cad chos nyid kyis yang dag par bsgrub par 'gyur zhing sgra shes par bya ba la mkhas pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang gis a las bstsogs pa'i
150a4('bum): yi ge la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya 'di dang / a las stsogs pa'i yi ge la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i tshig 'di dag thos te/ thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed cing gzhan la yang tshul dang ldan
150a5('bum): pa'i blos ston na/ de la legs pa nyi shu yod par shes par bya'o/ /nyi shu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa dang ldan/ blos gros dang ldan/ rtogs pa dang ldan/ blo dang ldan/ dga' ba dang ldan/ ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan/ spobs
150a6('bum): pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo 'di yang nyon mongs pa med par thob cing the tsom med par 'gyur la/ gzhan las ngag snyan pa thos kyang chags par 'gyur ba myed cing zhe gcod pa'i tshig thos kyang khong khro bar
150a7('bum): mi 'gyur bas/ mtho ba med cing dma' ba med de/ tshul bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ba dang / sgra la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / /phung po la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / khams la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / skye mched
150a8('bum): la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / bden pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas te/ rgyu la mkhas shing rkyen la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / chos nyid la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /
150b1('bum): dbang po rab dang tha ma shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / 'chi 'pho dang skye ba shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / lha'i rna ba'i shes pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / pha rol gyis sems shes par bya
150b2('bum): ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / zag pa zad pa shes par bya ba
150b3('bum): la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa bstan pa shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / 'gro ba la mkhas shing ldog pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / spyod lam la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /
150b4('bum): khrel yod pa dang ngo tsha shes pa la mkhas pa yang 'thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo a las stsogs pa'i yi ge la 'jug pa 'di yang de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
150b5('bum): theg pa chen po'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bcu pa'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu gcig pa/ rab 'byor gang yang khyod 'di skad du ji ltar
150b6('bum): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing sa nas sar 'phar
150b7('bum): te/ rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing / sa nas sar 'phar ba yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad 'pho ba med pas/ chos gang yang 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba
150b8('bum): med de/ 'pho ba 'am nye bar 'pho ba med do/ /'on kyang chos thams cad kyis gang yin pa de la rlom sems su byed pa 'am/ sems med pa des yongs su sbyong ba yang myi byed pa ma yin la/ sa de yang yang dag par rjes su
151a1('bum): myi mthong ngo / /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ /rab 'byor sa dang po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su sbyang ba bcu po 'di dag bya ste/
151a2('bum): bcu gang zhe na/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lhag pa'i bsam pa las stsogs pa yongs su sbyang ba dang / mtshan ma mi dmigs pa'i phyir phan pa'i dngos po yongs su sbyang zhig sems can myi dmigs pa'i phyir/ sems
151a3('bum): can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid yongs su sbyang ba dang / sbyin pa dang / gtong ba dang / len pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir gtong ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / des rlom sems su myi bya ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen bstan
151a4('bum): pa yongs su sbyang ba dang / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos btsal ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / khyim mi dmigs pa'i phyir yang dang yang 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i mtshan
151a5('bum): ma mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi sku la mos pa yongs su sbyang ba dang / chos kyi rnam pa myi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos rnam par dbye ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / chos kyi yang dag pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir
151a6('bum): nga rgyal dang khengs pa bstsal ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / tshig mi dmigs pa'i phyir bden pa'i tshig yongs su sbyang ba ste/ rab 'byor yongs su sbyang ba bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang
151a7('bum): po la gnas pas bya ba dag go/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gnyis pa la gnas pas chos brgyad po 'di dag yang dang yang du yid la bya ba ste/ de la nan tan du bya'o/ /brgyad gang
151a8('bum): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang / byas pa shes shing drin du gzo ba dang / bzod pa'i mthu la gnas pa dang / rab tu dga' zhing spro ba myong bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs
