203a7('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba dmyigs su myed do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sems can yongs su smyin
203a8('bum): par bya ba dmyigs su myed do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba dmigs su myed do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar
203b1('bum): bzung na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba dmyigs su myed do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sems can yongs su smin par bya
203b2('bum): ba dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmigs su myed do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
203b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmyigs su myed do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmyigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam
203b4('bum): par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmyigs su myed do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas
203b5('bum): kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmyigs su myed do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par
203b6('bum): dag pa nye bar bzung na/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
203b7('bum): kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmyigs su myed do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
203b8('bum): dag par bya ba dmyigs su myed do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmigs su myed do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ dor ba
204a1('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmyigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba
204a2('bum): dmyigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong
204a3('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmyigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmyigs su med do/ /
204a4('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmyigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir
204a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmyigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmigs su
204a6('bum): med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig lnga dmyigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig lnga dmyigs su med do/ /
204a7('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig lnga dmyigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig lnga dmyigs su med do/ /shin tu
204a8('bum): rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig lnga dmyigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mig lnga dmyigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa nye
204b1('bum): bar bzung na/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig lnga dmyigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig lnga dmyigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar
204b2('bum): bzung na/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mig lnga dmyigs su med do/ shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig lnga dmyigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par
204b3('bum): dag pa nye bar bzung na/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mig lnga dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig lnga dmyigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par
204b4('bum): dag pa nye bar bzung na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig lnga dmyigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig lnga dmyigs su med do/ /
204b5('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig lnga dmyigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig lnga dmigs
204b6('bum): su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mig lnga dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
204b7('bum): nyid kyi phyir mig lnga dmigs su med do/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad myi dmyigs pa'i
204b8('bum): tshul gyis theg pa chen pos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bcu gcig pa'o// //
205a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bco lnga pa/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po
205a2('bum): theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba ni/ lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung bar 'gyur bas/ de'i slad du theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das theg pa de ni nam
205a3('bum): mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ ji ltar nam mkha' sems can grangs dang tshad ma mchis pa'i go 'byed pa de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di yang sems can grangs dang tshad ma mchis pa'i go 'byed pas
205a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po ste/ theg pa chen po de la 'gro ba dang 'ong ba zhes bgyi ba 'am/ gnas pa yang ma mchis sngon gyi
205a5('bum): mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus zhes bgyi ba yang ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba zhes bgyi ba yang ma mchis la/ gnas pa
205a6('bum): pa yang ma mchis pa de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di la yang 'gro ba mi dmigs/ 'byung ba mi dmigs/ gnas pa mi dmigs so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni dus gsum
205a7('bum): mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di yang dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs
205a8('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po 'di ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa pas/ de'i slad du theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /
205b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ste/ sbyin pa'i
205b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/
205b3('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad
205b4('bum): dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad de dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par rtse ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba'i rgyal
205b5('bum): mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyis
205b6('bum): dbyings su nges pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar
205b7('bum): rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dpung rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa'i
205b8('bum): ting nge 'dzin dang / tshig bla dgas la yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyogs rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mnyam pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang chos thams cad
206a1('bum): yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
206a2('bum): dbang po'i dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyan gyi rjes su song ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snrel gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
206a3('bum): rnam par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshol ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas la rten pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od mtha' yas
206a4('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dag pa dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / glog gi
206a5('bum): sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad myi shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / myi 'pham pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzi brjid yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad pa dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / myi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
206a6('bum): 'jig pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyi ma'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba byed pa'i ting nge
206a7('bum): 'dzin dang / bya ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
206a8('bum): rin chen mtha'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos dam pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyis 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang rnam par 'thar pa'i ting nge 'dzin
206b1('bum): dang chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge mnyam par 'god pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dmyigs pa gcod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gyur ba med pa'i ting nge
206b2('bum): 'dzin dang / rnam pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mying nges par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas med par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab rib med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyod pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / g.yo ba
206b3('bum): med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yul las rgal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems med par gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal
206b4('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spobs pa mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las 'da' ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
206b5('bum): yongs su gcod pa byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nem nur rnam par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas su bya ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gcig tu rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par mngon par bsgrub pa'i
206b6('bum): ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'dor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brda' dang sgra la 'jug pa'i
206b7('bum): ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgron ma 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par dmyigs pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa'i
206b8('bum): mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad myi shes pa'i za ma tog gi ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi blo gros kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag
207a1('bum): pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'thun pa dang 'gal ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma myed
207a2('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying por ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma myed par rgyas pa'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / glog gi 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyan chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin
207a3('bum): dang / ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul myed cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon myongs pa myed par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams
207a4('bum): cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas dmyigs su myed pa la brtson pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel
207a5('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' ltar chags pa myed pas/ rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/ 'di ni byang chub
207a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /
207a7('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang myed pa stong pa nyid dang /
207a8('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong
207b1('bum): pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta
207b2('bum): ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lags bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
207b3('bum): brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par
207b4('bum): 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
207b5('bum): bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab
207b6('bum): 'byor gang yang khyod kyi 'di skad du theg pa de ni/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi mnan te 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa ni/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gang zhe
207b7('bum): na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams te/ rab 'byor gal te 'dod pa'i khams de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log
207b8('bum): ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brten la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
208a1('bum): rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'dod pa'i khams de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i
208a2('bum): chos can ste/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te gzugs kyi khams de bzhin/ ma nor
208a3('bum): ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brten la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang /
208a4('bum): myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur ste/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi khams de rnam par brtag pa/ rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brten la ther
208a5('bum): zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te gzugs myed pa'i
208a6('bum): khams de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen
208a7('bum): po 'dis kyang / lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor gzugs myed pa'i khams de rnam par brtag pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su
208a8('bum): bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te
208b1('bum): 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te gzugs de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brten la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi
208b2('bum): dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor gzugs de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed
208b3('bum): pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan
208b4('bum): te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te tshor ba de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur
208b5('bum): ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang / lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor tshor ba de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par
208b6('bum): bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan
208b7('bum): te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te 'du shes de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brten la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i
208b8('bum): chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'du shes de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par
209a1('bum): bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brten la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
209a2('bum): rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te 'du byed de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brten la ther zug myi
209a3('bum): 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'du byed de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par
209a4('bum): bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung
209a5('bum): ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te rnam par shes pa de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i
209a6('bum): chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rnam par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam
209a7('bum): par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brten la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan
209a8('bum): cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te myig de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brten la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can
209b1('bum): gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor myig de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa yongs
209b2('bum): su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi rten la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa 'dis lha dang myi lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /
209b3('bum): rab 'byor gal te rna ba de bzhin/ ma nor pa de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brten la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin
209b4('bum): na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rna ba de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/
209b5('bum): myi rtag cing myi brten la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor
209b6('bum): gal te sna de bzhin/ ma nor pa de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ci lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/
209b7('bum): theg pa 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor sna de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi
209b8('bum): brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal
210a1('bum): de lce de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci logs ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brten la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyis dngos po zhig yin na ni/
210a2('bum): theg pa chen po'i 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi gnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor lce de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brten la
210a3('bum): ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te lus de bzhin ma nor pa
210a4('bum): de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi
210a5('bum): dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor lus de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur
210a6('bum): ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te yid de bzhin/ ma nor pa de bzhin/ gzhan
210a7('bum): ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin
210a8('bum): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor yid de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can
210b1('bum): te/ dngos po med pa'i de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te gzugs de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin
210b2('bum): pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta bzhin tu rtag cing brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin
210b3('bum): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor gzugs de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi rten la ther zug ma
210b4('bum): yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te sgra de bzhin/ ma nor ba
210b5('bum): de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang
210b6('bum): myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor sgra de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi rten la ther zug ma yin
210b7('bum): 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te dri de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma
210b8('bum): yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
211a1('bum): rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor dri de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brten la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos
211a2('bum): can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te ro de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma
211a3('bum): yin pa de bzhin de/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag par ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin
211a4('bum): dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor ro de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/
211a5('bum): dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te reg de bzhin ma nor pa de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log
211a6('bum): ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing
211a7('bum): 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor reg de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brten la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po'i 'dis
211a8('bum): lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te chos de bzhin/ ma nor pa de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/
211b1('bum): ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor
211b2('bum): chos de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
211b3('bum): 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te myig gi rnam par shes pa de bzhin/ ma nor pa de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin
211b4('bum): du rtag cing brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor myig gi rnam par shes
211b5('bum): pa de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas
211b6('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa de bzhin/ ma nor pa de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du
211b7('bum): rtag cig brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rna ba'i rnam
211b8('bum): par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi rten la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha dang / myi dang / lha
212a1('bum): ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa de bzhin/ ma nor pa de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag
212a2('bum): pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab
212a3('bum): 'byor sna'i rnam par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha
212a4('bum): dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa de bzhin/ ma nor pa de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang
212a5('bum): dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur
212a6('bum): te/ rab 'byor lce'i rnam par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha
212a7('bum): dang / myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden
212a8('bum): pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtag la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing
212b1('bum): 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor lus kyi rnam par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg
212b2('bum): pa chen po 'dis lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa de bzhin/ ma nor pa de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log
212b3('bum): ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brten la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan
212b4('bum): cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor yid kyi rnam par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed
212b5('bum): pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa de bzhin/ ma nor pa de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin
212b6('bum): ba de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
212b7('bum): 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor myig gi 'dus te reg pa de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can
212b8('bum): te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa de bzhin/ ma nor pa de bzhin/ gzhan ma
213a1('bum): yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma
213a2('bum): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur
213a3('bum): ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa de bzhin/ ma nor pa de bzhin/
213a4('bum): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang / lha
213a5('bum): ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i
213a6('bum): chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa de bzhin/ ma nor pa de bzhin/
213a7('bum): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang / lha ma
213a8('bum): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyi mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma
213b1('bum): yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa de bzhin/ ma nor pa
213b2('bum): de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang /
213b3('bum): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma
213b4('bum): yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa de bzhin/ ma nor pa de bzhin/
213b5('bum): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma
213b6('bum): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyi mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa de rnam par brtag pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yin
213b7('bum): 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
213b8('bum): tshor ba de bzhin/ ma nor pa de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg
214a1('bum): pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/
214a2('bum): yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba
214a3('bum): yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba de bzhin/ ma nor pa de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cig brtan la ther zug myi
214a4('bum): 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus de reg pa'i rkyen kyis
214a5('bum): tshor ba de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du
214a6('bum): bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te/ 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba de bzhin/ ma nor pa de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag
214a7('bum): pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug myi 'byung ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur
214a8('bum): te/ rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg
214b1('bum): pa chen po 'dis lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba de bzhin/ ma nor pa de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/
214b2('bum): phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brten la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis

214b8('bum): pa de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brten la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang /
215a1('bum): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag
215a2('bum): cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te sa'i khams
215a3('bum): de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis

215b4('bum): la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin tu rtag cing brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can kyis dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyi mnan cing 'byung
215b5('bum): bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rlung gi khams de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po
215b6('bum): 'dis lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te nam mkha'i khams de bzhin/ ma nor pa de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa
215b7('bum): yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi

216a1('bum): dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams de bzhin/ ma nor pa de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la
216a2('bum): bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i/ chos can kyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan

216a8('bum): rtag cing brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'du byed de
216b1('bum): rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil
216b2('bum): kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te rnam par shes pa de bzhin/ ma nor pa de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin tu rtag cing brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i

216b8('bum): mched drug de bzhin/ ma nor pa de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po

217a2('bum): la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te reg pa de bzhin/ ma nor pa de bzhin/

217a8('bum): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te sred pa de bzhin/ ma nor pa de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag
217b1('bum): cing brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin ni/ theg chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor sred pa de rnam par brtags
217b2('bum): pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pa de'i phyir theg pa chen po'i 'dis lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung
217b3('bum): ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te len pa de bzhin/ ma nor pa de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin
217b4('bum): na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor len pa de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi
217b5('bum): brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te srid pa de bzhin/ ma nor pa
217b6('bum): de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang /
217b7('bum): lha ma yin bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor srid pa de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/
217b8('bum): dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te skye ba de bzhin/ ma nor pa de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci
218a1('bum): log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis
218a2('bum): mnan cing 'byung ba myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor skye ba de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi rtag la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po myed pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis
218a3('bum): lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te rga shi de bzhin/ ma nor pa de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa yin ste/ ji lta ba
218a4('bum): bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug myi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rga shi de
218a5('bum): rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ myi rtag cing myi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
218a6('bum): rten zil kyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu drug pa/ rab 'byor gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/
218a7('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po myed la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis
218a8('bum): lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang
218b1('bum): lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po myed la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du
218b2('bum): bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du
218b3('bum): bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po myed la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil
218b4('bum): kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'di kyang lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis
218b5('bum): mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po myed la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab
218b6('bum): 'byor gal te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab
218b7('bum): 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po myed la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te shes rab
218b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha
219a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa dngos po myed la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te nang stong pa nyid dngos
219a2('bum): po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid dngos po myed la/ dngos po ma yin
219a3('bum): pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te phyi stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/
219a4('bum): theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid dngos po med la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi
219a5('bum): dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin
219a6('bum): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid dngos po myed la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan
219a7('bum): cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba myi
219a8('bum): 'gyur te/ rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dngos po myed la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te
219b1('bum): chen po stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid dngos po myed
219b2('bum): la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed
219b3('bum): pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid dngos po myed la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha
219b4('bum): dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma

219b8('bum): gal te 'tha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor
220a1('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dngos po myed la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor
220a2('bum): gal te thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor

220a7('bum): pa chen po 'dis lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen

221b6('bum): te/ rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dngos po myed la/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te lam dngos po yod pa zhig
221b7('bum): yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor lam dngos po myed la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang lha ma
221b8('bum): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
222a1('bum): rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dngos po myed la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung
222a2('bum): ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te bsam gtan rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor bsam
222a3('bum): gtan rnams dngos po myed la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te tshad med pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po

222a7('bum): bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te rnam par thar pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil
222a8('bum): kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rnam par thar pa rnams dngos po myed la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab
222b1('bum): 'byor gal te mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/
222b2('bum): rab 'byor mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dngos po myed la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te rnam par
222b3('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab
222b4('bum): 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dngos po myed la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab
222b5('bum): 'byor gal te mngon par shes pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams
222b6('bum): dngos po myed la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa
222b7('bum): ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams dngos po myed la dngos po ma yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang /
222b8('bum): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te gzungs kyis sgo rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
223a1('bum): 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor gzungs kyis sgo rnams dngos po myed la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba
223a2('bum): yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor
223a3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dngos po myed la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te myi 'jigs pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig
223a4('bum): yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor myi 'jigs pa rnams dngos po myed la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha
223a5('bum): dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du
223a6('bum): bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dngos po myed la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis
223a7('bum): mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te snying rje chen po dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/
223a8('bum): rab 'byor snying rje chen po dngos po myed la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
223b1('bum): brgyad dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dngos po myed la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i
223b2('bum): phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te rigs kyi sa'i chos dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas
223b3('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rigs kyi sa'i chos dngos po myed la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te brgyad pa'i
223b4('bum): sa'i chos dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor brgyad pa'i sa'i chos dngos po myed la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen
223b5('bum): po 'dis lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
223b6('bum): 'jig rten zil gyi mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos dngos po myed la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor
223b7('bum): gal te lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
223b8('bum): chos dngos po med la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po

224a6('bum): sems dpa'i chos dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i chos
