225a8('bum): rab 'byor gal te chos kyi dbyings dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings dngos po
225b1('bum): myed la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te de bzhin nyid dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis
225b2('bum): kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid dngos po myed la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis
225b3('bum): mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te yang dag pa'i mtha' dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/
225b4('bum): rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha' dngos po myed la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings dngos po yod
225b5('bum): pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings dngos po myed la dngos po ma yin pas/
225b6('bum): de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg
225b7('bum): pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen
225b8('bum): po 'dis lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed phyin cad snying po byang chub tu 'dug gi
226a1('bum): bar du sems bskyed pa ji snyed cig byung ba de dag dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
226a2('bum): zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed phyin cad snying po byang chub du 'dug gi bar du sems bskyed pa ji snyed cig byung ba de dag
226a3('bum): dngos po myed la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa'
226a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes rdo rje lta bu dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar
226a5('bum): myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes rdo rje lta bu dngos po myed la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil
226a6('bum): kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes rdo rje lta bu'i dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
226a7('bum): dpa' chen pos kyang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dngos po myed par khong du chud cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par yang myi 'gyur/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du
226a8('bum): bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes rdo rje lta bu'i dngos po myed la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir byang chub
226b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dngos po myed par khong du chud de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'thob/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas
226b2('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/
226b3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan cing / gzi brjid dang dpal gyis lham mer myi 'gyur/ lhan
226b4('bum): ner myi 'gyur/ lhang nger myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dngos po myed la dngos po ma yin pas/ de bzhin
226b5('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil kyis mnan te/ gzi brjid dang dpal kyis lham me lhan ne lhang nger gyur pa yin no/ /rab
226b6('bum): 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis
226b7('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs par myi mdzad de/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od dngos po myed de/ dngos po ma yin pas/
226b8('bum): de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'od kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa mdzad do/ /rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
227a1('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
227a2('bum): sangs rgyas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gsung gis mngon par go bar yang myi mdzad de/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
227a3('bum): gsung yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa dngos po myed la dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye
227a4('bum): ma snyed gsung gis mngon par go bar mdzad do/ /rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa
227a5('bum): ma yin na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am sus kyang rung ste/ 'jig rten du
227a6('bum): chos dang ldan par bskor bar myi nus pa skor bar yang myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dngos po myed de dngos po ma yin
227a7('bum): pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyis 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ sus kyang rung ste/ 'jig
227a8('bum): rten du chos dang ldan par bskor bar myi nus pa rab tu bskor ro/ /rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gang gi don du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i
227b1('bum): sems can de dag dngos po yod pa zhig yin te/ dngos po myed pa ma yin na ni/ sems can de dag phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor
227b2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gang gi don du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sems can de dag dngos po myed de/ dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir sems can
227b3('bum): rnams phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/ /yongs su mya las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gang yang khyod
227b4('bum): kyis 'di skad du/ theg pa chen po de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o zhes smras pa ni de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam mo/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'
227b5('bum): la ni shar phyogs dmyigs su myed do/ /lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / bla dang / 'og dang / phyogs 'tshams dmyigs su myed do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la
227b6('bum): shar phyogs dmyigs su myed do/ /lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / bla dang / 'og dang / phyogs 'tshams dmyigs su myed do/ /de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes
227b7('bum): bya'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni ring po ma yin/ thung ngu ma yin/ zlum po ma yin/ gru bzhi ma yin/ mnyam pa ma yin/ myi mnyam pa ma yin no/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa
227b8('bum): chen po de yang ring po ma yin/ thung ngu ma yin/ zlum po ma yin/ gru bzhi ma yin/ mnyam pa ma yin/ myi mnyam pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor
227c1('bum): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni sngon po ma yin/ ser po ma yin/ dmar po ma yin/ dkar po ma yin/ leb rgan ma yin/ shel dang dngul gyi kha dog du 'dug pa ma yin no/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du
227c2('bum): theg pa chen po de yang sngon po ma yin/ ser po ma yin/ dmar po ma yin/ dkar po ma yin/ leb rgan ma yin/ shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg chen po de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o/ /
227c3('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da lta byung ba ma yin no/ rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da lta byung ba yang
227c4('bum): ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la ni 'grib pa myed do/ /'phel ba myed do/ /'bri ba myed do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang
227c5('bum): 'grib pa myed do/ /'phel ba med do/ /'bri ba myed do/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ /nam mkha' la kun nas nyon mongs pa myed do/ /rnam par byang ba myed de
227c6('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la yang kun nas nyon mongs pa myed/ rnam par byang ba myed do/ /de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la
227c7('bum): skye ba myed do/ /'gag pa myed do/ /gnas pa myed do/ /mthar thug pa myed do/ /gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la yang skye ba myed do/ /'gag pa
227c8('bum): myed do/ /gnas pa myed do/ /mthar thug pa myed do/ /gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam
227d1('bum): mkha' ni dge ba ma yin/ myi dge ba ma yin/ lung du ma bstan pa ma yin no/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang dge ba ma yin/ myi dge ba ma yin/ lung du ma bstan pa ma yin no/ /de'i phyir theg pa de ni
227d2('bum): nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la ni mthong ba ma yin/ thos pa ma yin/ rig pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang
227d3('bum): mthong ba ma yin/ thos pa ma yin/ rig pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni shes par bya ba ma yin/
227d4('bum): shes par myi bya ba yang ma yin/ rnam par shes par bya ba yang ma yin/ yongs su shes par bya ba yang ma yin/ mngon du bya ba yang ma yin/ spang ba yang ma yin bsgom pa yang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du theg
227d5('bum): pa chen po de yang shes par bya ba yang ma yin/ shes par myi bya ba yang ma yin/ rnam par shes par bya ba yang ma yin/ yongs su shes par bya ba yang ma yin/ mngon du bya ba yang ma yin/ spang ba yang ma yin/ bsgom
227d6('bum): pa yang ma yin no/ /de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la ni rnam par smyin pa yang ma yin no/ rnam par smyin pa'i chos can yang ma yin no/ /
227d7('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang rnam par smyin pa yang ma yin/ rnam par smyin pa'i chos can yang ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste
227d8('bum): dper na/ nam mkha' ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin/ gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin no/ /rab 'byor de bzhin
228a1('bum): du theg pa chen po de yang 'dod pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin/ gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg
228a2('bum): pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' la ni 'dod chags dang ldan pa ma yin/ 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin/ zhe sdang dang ldan pa ma yin/ zhe sdang dang bral
228a3('bum): ba ma yin/ gti mug dang ldan pa ma yin/ gti mug dang bral ba ma yin no/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang 'dod chags dang ldan pa ma yin/ 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin/ zhe sdang dang ldan
228a4('bum): pa ma yin/ zhe sdang dang bral ba ma yin/ gti mug dang ldan pa ma yin/ gti mug dang bral ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam
228a5('bum): mkha' la ni sems dang po bskyed pa myed do/ /gnyis pa myed do/ /gsum pa myed do/ /bzhi pa myed do/ /lnga pa myed do/ /drug pa myed do/ /bdun pa myed do/ /brgyad pa myed do/ /dgu pa myed do/ /sems bcu pa bskyed pa myed do/ /
228a6('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang sems dang po bskyed pa myed do/ /gnyis pa myed do/ /gsum pa myed do/ /bzhi pa myed do/ /lnga pa myed do/ /drug pa myed do/ /bdun pa myed do/ /brgyad pa myed do/ /dgu pa myed do/ /
228a7('bum): sems bcu pa bskyed pa myed do/ /de'i phyir theg pa chen po de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la ni dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa myed do/ /rigs kyi sa myed do/ /brgyad pa'i sa myed do/ /
228a8('bum): mthong ba'i sa myed do/ /bsrabs pa'i sa myed do/ /'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa myed do/ /byas pa rtogs pa'i sa myed do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la yang dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa myed do/ /rigs kyi
228b1('bum): sa myed do/ /brgyad pa'i sa myed do/ /mthong ba'i sa myed do/ /bsrabs pa'i sa myed do/ /'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa myed do/ /byas pa rtogs pa'i sa myed do/ /de'i phyir theg pa chen po de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o/ /
228b2('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myed do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myed do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myed do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid myed do/ /de'i phyir de bzhin du theg pa chen
228b3('bum): po de la yang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myed do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myed do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myed do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid myed do/ /de'i phyir theg pa chen po de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o/ /
228b4('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la ni nyan thos kyi sa myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa myed do/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa myed do/ /rab 'byor de
228b5('bum): bzhin du theg pa chen po de la yang nyan thos kyi sa myed/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa myed/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa myed/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa myed de/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po de ni nam mkha' dang
228b6('bum): mnyam zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni gzugs dang ldan pa ma yin/ gzugs myed pa ma yin/ bstan du yod pa ma yin/ bstan du med pa ma yin/ thogs pa yod pa ma yin/ thogs
228b7('bum): pa myed pa ma yin/ ldan pa ma yin/ myi ldan pa ma yin no/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gzugs dang ldan pa ma yin/ gzugs myed pa ma yin/ bstan du yod pa ma yin/ bstan du myed pa ma yin/ thogs
228b8('bum): pa yod pa ma yin/ thogs pa myed pa ma yin/ ldan pa ma yin/ myi ldan pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni rtag pa ma yin/
229a1('bum): myi rtag pa ma yin/ bde ba ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba ma yin/ bdag yod pa ma yin/ bdag myed pa ma yin/ sdug pa ma yin myi sdug pa ma yin no/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang rtag pa ma
229a2('bum): yin/ myi rtag pa ma yin/ bde ba ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba ma yin/ bdag yod pa ma yin/ bdag myed pa ma yin/ sdug pa ma yin/ myi sdug pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o/ /
229a3('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni stong pa ma yin/ myi stong pa ma yin/ mtshan ma yod pa ma yin/ mtshan ma myed pa ma yin/ smon pa yod pa ma yin/ smon pa myed pa ma yin no/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du
229a4('bum): theg pa chen po de yang stong pa ma yin/ myi stong pa ma yin/ mtshan ma yod pa ma yin/ mtshan ma myed pa ma yin/ smon pa yod pa ma yin/ smon pa myed pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam
229a5('bum): zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni zhi ba ma yin/ ma zhi ba ma yin/ dben pa ma yin/ myi dben pa ma yin no/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang zhi ba ma yin/ ma zhi ba ma yin/
229a6('bum): dben pa ma yin/ myi dben pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni snang ba ma yin/ mun pa ma yin no/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen
229a7('bum): po de yang snang ba ma yin/ mun pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni dmyigs su yod pa yang ma yin/ dmyigs su myed pa yang ma yin no/ /
229a8('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang dmyigs su yod pa yang ma yin/ dmyigs su myed pa yang ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/
229b1('bum): nam mkha' ni brjod du yod pa yang ma yin/ brjod du myed pa yang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang brjod du yod pa yang ma yin/ brjod du myed pa yang ma yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa de ni nam mkha'
229b2('bum): dang mnyam zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ 'di ltar theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du de ltar nam mkha' sems can tshad myed
229b3('bum): grangs myed pa'i go 'byed pa de bzhin du/ theg pa chen po de yang sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa'i go 'byed do/ /zhes smras pa ni/ de de bzhin no/ /rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ ji ltar nam mkha' sems can
229b4('bum): tshad myed grangs myed pa'i go 'byed pa de bzhin du/ theg pa chen po 'di yang sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa'i go 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sems can myed pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' myed par rig
229b5('bum): par bya'o/ /nam mkha' myed pa'i theg pa chen po myed par rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis kyang theg pa chen po de sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa'i go 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar
229b6('bum): sems can gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sems can tshad myed pa'i phyir/ nam
229b7('bum): mkha' tshad myed par rig par bya'o/ /nam mkha' tshad myed pa'i phyir/ theg pa chen po tshad myed par rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis kyang theg pa chen po de sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa'i go
229b8('bum): 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar sems can gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /
230a1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sems can dpag tu myed pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' dpag tu myed par rig par bya'o/ /nam mkha' dpag tu myed pa'i phyir/ theg pa chen po dpag tu myed par rig par bya ste/
230a2('bum): rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis kyang theg pa chen po de sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa'i go 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar sems can gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg
230a3('bum): pa chen po gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang sems can myed pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings myed par rig par bya'o/ /chos kyi dbyings myed pa'i phyir nam
230a4('bum): mkha' myed par rig par bya'o/ /nam mkha' myed pa'i phyir/ theg pa chen po myed par rig par bya'o/ /theg pa chen po myed pa'i phyir myi 'jal ba myed par rig par bya'o/ /myi 'jal ba myed pa'i phyir/ myi 'grangs pa
230a5('bum): myed par rig par bya'o/ /myi 'grangs pa myed pa'i phyir/ myi dpogs pa myed pa rig par bya'o/ /myi dpogs pa myed pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad myed pa rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang
230a6('bum): theg pa chen po de sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa'i go 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar sems can gang yin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa
230a7('bum): chen po gang yin pa dang / myi 'jal ba gang yin pa dang / myi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang / myi dpogs pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor
230a8('bum): gzhan yang sems can myed pa'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid myed par rig par bya'o/ /de bzhin nyid myed pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' myed par rig par bya'o/ /nam mkha' myed pa'i phyir theg pa chen po myed par rig par bya'o/ /
230b1('bum): theg pa chen po myed pa'i phyir myi 'jal ba myed par rig par bya'o/ /myi 'jal ba myed pa'i phyir myi 'grangs pa med par rig par bya'o/ /myi 'grangs pa myed pa'i phyir myi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o/ /myi dpogs pa myed pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad myed par rig par bya ste/
230b2('bum): rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po des sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa'i go 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar sems can gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa
230b3('bum): dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / myi 'jal ba gang yin pa dang / myi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang / myi dpogs pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmyigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /
230b4('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag myed pa'i phyir/ sems can myed par rig par bya'o/ /sems can myed pa'i phyir srog myed par rig par bya'o/ /srog myed pa'i phyir 'gro ba myed par rig par bya'o/ /'gro ba myed pa'i phyir
230b5('bum): gso' ba myed par rig par bya'o/ /gso' ba myed pa'i phyir skyes bu med par rig par bya'o/ /skyes bu myed pa'i phyir gang zag myed par rig par bya'o/ /gang zag myed pa'i phyir shed can myed par rig par bya'o/ /shed can
230b6('bum): myed pa'i phyir shed bdag myed par rig par bya'o/ /shed bdag myed pa'i phyir byed pa po myed par rig par bya'o/ /byed pa po myed pa'i phyir tshor ba po myed par rig par bya'o/ /tshor ba po myed pa'i phyir shes pa po myed par rig
230b7('bum): par bya'o/ /shes pa po myed pa'i phyir mthong ba po myed par rig par bya'o/ /mthong ba po myed pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i mtha' myed par rig par bya'o/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' myed pa'i phyir nam mkha' myed par rig par bya'o/ /
230b8('bum): nam mkha' myed pa'i phyir theg pa chen po myed par rig par bya'o/ /theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir myi 'jal ba med par rig par bya'o/ /myi 'jal ba myed pa'i phyir myi 'grangs pa myed par rig par bya'o/ /myi 'grangs
231a1('bum): pa myed pa'i phyir myi dpogs pa myed par rig par bya'o/ /myi dpogs pa myed pa'i phyir chos thams cad myed par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po de ni/ sems can tshad myed grangs myed
231a2('bum): pa'i go 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / sems can gang yin pa dang / srog gang yin pa dang / 'gro ba gang yin pa dang / gso' ba gang yin pa dang / skyes bu gang yin
231a3('bum): pa dang / gang zag gang yin pa dang / shed can gang yin pa dang / shed bdag gang yin pa dang / byed pa po gang yin pa dang / tshor ba po gang yin pa dang / shes pa po gang yin pa dang / mthong ba po gang yin pa dang /
231a4('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / myi 'jal ba gang yin pa dang / myi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang / myi dpogs pa gang yin pa dang / chos
231a5('bum): thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmyigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu bdun pa/ rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag myed pa'i phyir/
231a6('bum): sems can myed pa'i rig par bya'o/ /sems can myed pa'i phyir srog myed par rig par bya'o/ /srog myed pa'i phyir 'gro ba myed par rig par bya'o/ /'gro ba myed pa'i phyir gso' ba myed par rig par bya'o/ /
231a7('bum): gso' ba myed pa'i phyir skyes bu myed par rig par bya'o/ /skyes bu myed pa'i phyir gang zag myed par rig par bya'o/ /gang zag myed pa'i phyir shed can myed par rig par bya'o/ /shed can myed pa'i shed bdag myed
231a8('bum): par rig par bya'o/ /shed bdag myed pa'i phyir byed pa po myed par rig par bya'o/ /byed pa po myed pa'i phyir tshor ba po myed par rig par bya'o/ /tshor ba po myed pa'i phyir shes pa po myed par rig par bya'o/ /
231b1('bum): shes pa po med pa'i phyir mthong ba po myed par rig par bya'o/ /mthong ba po myed pa'i phyir bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed par rig par bya'o/ /bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed pa'i phyir gzugs myed par rig par bya'o/ /
231b2('bum): gzugs myed pa'i phyir tshor ba myed par rig par bya'o/ /tshor ba myed pa'i phyir 'du shes myed par rig par bya'o/ /'du shes myed pa'i phyir 'du byed myed par rig par bya'o/ /'du byed myed pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa myed par rig par bya'o/ /
231b3('bum): rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir nam mkha' myed pa rig par bya'o/ /nam mkha' myed pa'i phyir theg pa chen po myed par rig par bya'o/ /theg pa chen po myed pa'i phyir myi 'jal ba myed par rig par bya'o/ /myi 'jal ba myed pa'i
231b4('bum): phyir myi 'grangs pa myed par rig par bya'o/ /myi 'grangs pa myed pa'i phyir myi dpogs pa myed par rig par bya'o/ /myi dpogs pa myed pa'i phyir chos thams cad myed par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ theg pa chen
231b5('bum): po des sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa'i go 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / sems can gang yin pa dang / srog gang yin pa dang / 'gro ba gang yin pa dang / gso' ba
231b6('bum): gang yin pa dang / skyes bu gang yin pa dang / gang zag gang yin pa dang / shed can gang yin pa dang / shed bdag gang yin pa dang / byed pa po gang yin pa dang / tshor ba po gang yin pa dang / shes pa po gang yin pa dang /
231b7('bum): mthong ba po gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / 'du shes gang yin pa dang / 'du byed gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa
231b8('bum): gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / myi 'jal ba gang yin pa dang / myi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang / myi dpogs pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad gang yin pa
232a1('bum): de dag thams cad kyang dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag myed pa'i phyir sems can myed par rig par bya'o/ /sems can myed pa'i phyir srog myed par rig par bya'o/ /
232a2('bum): srog myed pa'i phyir 'gro ba myed par rig par bya'o/ /'gro ba myed pa'i phyir gso' ba myed par rig par bya'o/ /gso' ba myed pa'i phyir skyes bu myed par rig par bya'o/ /skyes bu myed pa'i phyir gang zag myed par
232a3('bum): rig par bya'o/ /gang zag myed pa'i phyir shed can myed par rig par bya'o/ /shed can myed pa'i phyir shed bdag myed par rig par bya'o/ /shed bdag myed pa'i phyir byed pa po myed par rig bar bya'o/ /byed
232a4('bum): pa po myed pa'i phyir tshor ba po myed par rig par bya'o/ /tshor ba po myed pa'i phyir shes pa po myed par rig par bya'o/ /shes pa po myed pa'i phyir mthong ba po myed par rig par bya'o/ /mthong ba po myed pa'i
232a5('bum): phyir bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed par rig par bya'o/ /bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed pa'i phyir myig myed par rig par bya'o/ /myig myed pa'i phyir rna ba myed par rig par bya'o/ /rna ba myed pa'i
232a6('bum): phyir sna myed par rig par bya'o/ /sna myed pa'i phyir lce myed par rig par bya'o/ /lce myed pa'i phyir lus myed par rig par bya'o/ /lus myed pa'i phyir yid myed par rig par bya'o/ /yid myed pa'i phyir nam mkha'
232a7('bum): myed par rig par bya'o/ /nam mkha' myed pa'i phyir theg pa chen po myed par rig par bya'o/ /theg pa chen po myed pa'i phyir myi 'jal ba myed par rig par bya'o/ /myi 'jal ba myed pa'i phyir myi 'grangs pa myed par rig par
232a8('bum): bya'o/ /myi 'grangs pa myed pa'i phyir myi dpogs pa myed par rig par bya'o/ /myi dpogs pa myed pa'i phyir chos thams cad myed par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po de sems can
232b1('bum): tshad myed grangs myed pa'i go 'byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / sems can gang yin pa dang / srog gang yin pa dang / 'gro ba gang yin pa dang / gso' ba gang yin pa dang /

232b5('bum): med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag myed pa'i phyir sems can myed par rig par bya'o/ /sems can myed pa'i phyir srog myed par rig par bya'o/ srog myed pa'i phyir 'gro ba myed par rig par bya'o/ /'gro ba myed pa'i phyir

236b3('bum): mkha'i khams gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / myi 'jal ba gang yin pa dang / myi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang / myi dpogs pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad gang
236b4('bum): yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag myed pa'i phyir/ sems can myed par rig par bya'o/ /sems can myed pa'i phyir srog myed par rig par bya'o/ /srog myed pa'i phyir 'gro ba

237a1('bum): med par rig par bya'o/ /ming dang gzugs med pa'i phyir skye mched drug med par rig par bya'o/ /skye mched drug med pa'i phyir reg pa med par rig par bya'o/ /reg pa med pa'i phyir tshor ba med par rig par bya'o/ /
237a2('bum): tshor ba med pa'i phyir sred pa med par rig par bya'o/ /sred pa med pa'i phyir len pa med par rig par bya'o/ /len pa med pa'i phyir srid pa med par rig par bya'o/ /srid pa med pa'i phyir skye ba med par rig par bya'o/ /

237a4('bum): rig par bya'o/ /mi 'jal ba med pa'i phyir mi 'grangs pa med par rig par bya'o/ /mi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir mi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o/ /mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o/ /

241b3('bum): pa'i stobs rnams myed pa'i phyir/ myi 'jigs pa rnams myed par rig par bya'o/ /myi 'jigs rnams myed pa'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa myed par rig par bya'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa myed pa'i phyir
241b4('bum): snying rje chen po myed par rig par bya'o/ /snying rje chen po myed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa myed par rig par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa myed pa'i phyir nam mkha' myed par rig par bya'o/ /nam mkha'

264a1('bum): 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor snying rje chen po rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /
264a2('bum): snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba med/
264a3('bum): gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /snying rje chen po'i mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do// //
264a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu dgu pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par
264a5('bum): 'gyur ba myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos
264a6('bum): ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba
264a7('bum): med/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /rab

265a1('bum): dbyings ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/

265a3('bum): myi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba med gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar
265a4('bum): yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /rab 'byor byang chub ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/

265b2('bum): gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /rab 'byor 'dus byas ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin ni gang
265b3('bum): nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du yang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /'dus byas kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /

265b5('bum): gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /rab 'byor 'dus ma byas ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du yang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'dus ma byas kyi
265b6('bum): rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du yang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ 'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du yang 'gro ba med/
265b7('bum): gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /'dus ma byas kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du yang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid ni
265b8('bum): gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du yang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni 'ong ba yang med/ 'gro ba yang med/ gnas pa yang myed do/ /
266a1('bum): rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa de la sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs so/ /phyi ma'i mtha' yang myi dmyigs so/ /dbus kyang myi dmyigs te/ 'di ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i
266a2('bum): theg pa ste/ theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /zhes smras ni de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ theg pa 'di la sngon gyi mtha' yang myi dmyigs so/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang myi dmyigs/ dbus kyang myi dmyigs te/ dus
266a3('bum): gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i theg pa ste/ de'i phyir na theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyang 'das pa'i dus kyis stong ngo / /ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyang ma
266a4('bum): 'ongs pa'i dus kyis stong ngo / /da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang da ltar byung ba'i dus kyis stong ngo / /dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyang dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /theg pa chen po yang theg pa chen pos stong ngo /
266a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpas stong ste/ rab 'byor stong pa nyid la gcig ces bya ba myed do/ /gnyis shes bya ba med do/ /gsum shes bya ba med do/ /bzhi zhes bya ba med do/ /
266a6('bum): lnga zhes bya ba med do/ /drug ces bya ba med do/ /bdun zhes bya ba med do/ /brgyad ces bya ba med do/ /dgu zhes bya ba med do/ /bcu zhes bya ba med do/ /tha dad ces bya ba med do/ /de bas na 'di ni byang chub sems
266a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa ste/ de la mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /de la 'dod chags dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba yang myi dmyigs so/ /zhe sdang
266a8('bum): dang zhe sdang med pa yang myi dmigs so/ /gti mug dang gti mug med pa yang mi dmigs so/ /ming dang ming med pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyang myi dmyigs so/ /dge ba dang mi dge ba yang myi
266b1('bum): dmigs so/ /kha na ma tho ba yod pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa yang mi dmigs so/ /zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa yang mi dmigs so/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med
266b2('bum): pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa yang myi dmigs so/ /skye ba dang 'gag pa yang myi dmigs so/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba yang mi dmigs so/ /de la rtag pa dang
266b3('bum): mi rtag pa yang mi dmigs so/ /bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba yang mi dmigs so/ /bdag dang bdag med pa yang mi dmigs so/ /zhi ba dang ma zhi ba yang mi dmigs so/ /'dod pa'i khams dang 'dod pa'i khams
266b4('bum): las yang dag par 'da' ba yang myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs kyi khams las yang dag par 'da' ba yang mi dmigs so/ /gzugs med pa'i khams dang gzugs med pa'i khams las
266b5('bum): yang dag par 'da' ba yang mi dmigs so/ /'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa yang mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de'i rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor 'das pa'i gzugs ni
266b6('bum): 'das pa'i gzugs kyi stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i gzugs dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmyigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i gzugs
266b7('bum): dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor 'das pa'i tshor ba ni 'das pa'i tshor bas stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i tshor ba dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyi stong
266b8('bum): pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i tshor ba dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor 'das pa'i 'du shes ni 'das pa'i 'du shes kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i 'du shes dmigs
267a1('bum): su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i 'du shes dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor 'das pa'i 'du byed ni 'das pa'i
267a2('bum): 'du byed kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i 'du byed dmyigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmyigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i 'du byed dmyigs par

267a4('bum): kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmyigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs ni ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs kyis
267a5('bum): stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs dmyigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmyigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs dmyigs par

267b1('bum): zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i 'du byed dmyigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmyigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i 'du byed dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor ma

267b4('bum): ba'i gzugs dmyigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmyigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i gzugs dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba ni da
267b5('bum): ltar byung ba'i tshor bas stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dmyigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmyigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs
267b6('bum): par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor da ltar byung ba'i 'du shes ni da ltar byung ba'i 'du shes kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i 'du shes dmyigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang
267b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmyigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i 'du shes dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor da ltar byung ba'i 'du byed ni da ltar byung ba'i 'du byed kyis stong ngo / /
267b8('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i 'du byed dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmyigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i 'du byed dmigs par 'gyur ba
268a1('bum): lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa ni da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa dmyigs su med de/
268a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar myi
268a3('bum): dmyigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmyigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/

268a5('bum): la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor tshul
268a6('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmigs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar myi dmigs/ tshul khrims kyi
268a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid
268a8('bum): la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/
268b1('bum): da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmigs/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu
268b2('bum): phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar myi dmigs/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la
268b3('bum): ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/
268b4('bum): ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
268b5('bum): phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid
268b6('bum): la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das
268b7('bum): pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/
268b8('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
269a1('bum): rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid la yang mnyam pa nyid la myi
269a2('bum): dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol
269a3('bum): tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum
269a4('bum): mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/
269a5('bum): mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/
269a6('bum): rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ nang stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ nang stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ nang stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
269a7('bum): rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/
269a8('bum): mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/
269b1('bum): phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ phyi stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ phyi stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/
269b2('bum): mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/
269b3('bum): ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa
269b4('bum): nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/
269b5('bum): mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig
269b6('bum): smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni
269b7('bum): da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs
269b8('bum): pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/
270a1('bum): ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ chen po stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/
270a2('bum): chen po stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ chen po stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs
270a3('bum): pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i
270a4('bum): dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmigs/
270a5('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmigs/
270a6('bum): mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus
270a7('bum): dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ 'dus byas
270a8('bum): stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus
270b1('bum): myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyang myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs
270b2('bum): pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ 'dus ma byas stong pa
270b3('bum): nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das
270b4('bum): pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i
270b5('bum): dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/
270b6('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/
270b7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid
270b8('bum): la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong
271a1('bum): pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni
271a2('bum): dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang
271a3('bum): myi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs
271a4('bum): pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/
271a5('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/
271a6('bum): mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus
271a7('bum): dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi
271a8('bum): dmyigs/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi
271b1('bum): dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa
271b2('bum): lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ chos thams cad
271b3('bum): stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
271b4('bum): mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/
271b5('bum): mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong
271b6('bum): pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni dus gsum
271b7('bum): mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung
271b8('bum): ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i
272a1('bum): dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni da ltar
272a2('bum): byung bar myi dmyigs/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi
272a3('bum): dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa
272a4('bum): lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa
272a5('bum): stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa
272a6('bum): nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa
272a7('bum): lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni
272a8('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam
272b1('bum): pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig
272b2('bum): smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i
272b3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i
272b4('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la
272b5('bum): mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor dran pa nye bar
272b6('bum): gzhag pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dus
272b7('bum): gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus
272b8('bum): kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta
273a1('bum): yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi
273a2('bum): dmigs/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/
273a3('bum): mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci
273a4('bum): zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ rdzu 'phrul gyi
273a5('bum): rkang pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa
273a6('bum): nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig
273a7('bum): smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor dbang po rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ dbang po rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi
273a8('bum): dmigs/ dbang po rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ dbang po rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs
273b1('bum): pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs
273b2('bum): pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor stobs rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ stobs rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ stobs rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/
273b3('bum): stobs rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung
273b4('bum): ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i
273b5('bum): dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni da ltar byung bar
273b6('bum): mi dmigs/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus
273b7('bum): mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/
273b8('bum): ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/
274a1('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni dus gsum mnyam
274a2('bum): pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/
274a3('bum): mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/
274a4('bum): rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ 'phags pa'i bden
274a5('bum): pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i
274a6('bum): dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/
274a7('bum): da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ bsam gtan rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ bsam gtan rnams
274a8('bum): ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ bsam gtan rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus kyang mi dmigs/
274b1('bum): mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig
274b2('bum): smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta ci yang zhig smos/ rab 'byor tshad med pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ tshad med pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/
274b3('bum): tshad med pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ tshad med pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma
274b4('bum): 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/
274b5('bum): ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ gzugs
274b6('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
274b7('bum): ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/
274b8('bum): mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/
275a1('bum): ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ni
275a2('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid
275a3('bum): la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/
275a4('bum): mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor mthar gyis gnas
275a5('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni
275a6('bum): da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus
275a7('bum): mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa
275a8('bum): nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
275b1('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ rnam par thar
275b2('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni dus gsum
275b3('bum): mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung
275b4('bum): ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/
275b5('bum): da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor mngon par shes pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ mngon par
275b6('bum): shes pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi
275b7('bum): dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das
275b8('bum): pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/
276a1('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
276a2('bum): mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/
276a3('bum): mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni sngon
276a4('bum): gyi mthar mi dmigs/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ gzungs kyi rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/
276a5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa
276a6('bum): nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/
276a7('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni da ltar
276a8('bum): byung bar mi dmigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam
276b1('bum): pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig
276b2('bum): smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni phyi ma'i
276b3('bum): mthar mi dmigs/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi
276b4('bum): dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus
276b5('bum): dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/
276b6('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs
276b7('bum): te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus
276b8('bum): kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus
277a1('bum): dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ sangs rgyas
277a2('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das
277a3('bum): pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la
277a4('bum): 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor gzhan yang so so'i skye bo ni sngon gyi mthar
277a5('bum): mi dmigs/ so so'i skye bo ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ so so'i skye bo ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ so so'i skye bo ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
277a6('bum): sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang nyan thos ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ nyan thos ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ nyan thos ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ nyan thos
277a7('bum): ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ rang sangs rgyas ni phyi ma'i
277a8('bum): mthar mi dmigs/ rang sangs rgyas ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ rang sangs rgyas ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang
277b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid
277b2('bum): la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/
277b3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor de ltar byang chub
277b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la bslab shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub
277b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba ste/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
277b6('bum): rten zil gyis mnan te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das
277b7('bum): kyis de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di/ legs par gsungs pa ni legs shing dge ste/ bcom ldan 'das theg
277b8('bum): pa chen po 'di la bslab shing 'os pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob bo/ /bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
278a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshad dang
278a2('bum): grangs ma mchis pa dag na/ dpag tu ma mchis pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang theg pa chen po 'di nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par
278a3('bum): 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang /
278a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs shing 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang /
278a5('bum): da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes par gyur to/ /brnyes so brnyes par 'gyur ro// //
